Unfortunately, this issue is rarely explored in past works. We present the first systematic investigation about the function interactions in common robot apps. First, we disclose the potential risks and damages caused by malicious interactions. By investigating the relationships among different functions, we identify and categorize three types of interaction risks. Second, we propose RTron, a novel system to detect and mitigate these risks and protect the operations of robot apps. We introduce security policies for each type of risks, and design coordination nodes to enforce the policies and regulate the interactions. We conduct extensive experiments on 110 robot apps from the ROS platform and two complex apps (Baidu Apollo and Autoware) widely adopted in industry. Evaluation results indicated RTron can correctly identify and mitigate all potential risks with negligible performance cost. To validate the practicality of the risks and solutions, we implement and evaluate RTron on a physical UGV (Turtlebot) with real-word apps and environments.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器人应用正变得越来越自动化、复杂和多样化。一个app通常由很多功能组成，相互之间以及与环境相互作用。这使得机器人可以执行各种任务。然而，它也为网络攻击打开了一扇新的大门:对手可以利用这些交互来威胁机器人操作的安全。遗憾的是，这个问题在以往的作品中很少被探讨。我们首次系统地研究了常见机器人应用程序中的功能交互。首先，我们披露了恶意交互造成的潜在风险和损害。通过研究不同功能之间的关系，我们识别并分类了三种类型的交互风险。其次，我们提出RTron，这是一种检测和减轻这些风险并保护机器人应用程序运行的新系统。我们为每种类型的风险引入安全策略，并设计协调节点来执行策略和调节交互。我们对来自ROS平台的110个机器人应用程序和业界广泛采用的两个复杂应用程序(百度Apollo和Autoware)进行了大量实验。评估结果表明，RTron能够正确识别和缓解所有潜在风险，而性能代价可以忽略不计。为了验证风险和解决方案的实用性，我们在具有真实应用和环境的物理UGV (Turtlebot)上实现并评估了RTron。
papers.title_zh: 机器人应用中功能交互风险的分析与缓解

papers.title: An Investigation of Byzantine Threats in Multi-Robot Systems
papers.authors: Gelei Deng, Yuan Zhou, Yuan Xu, Tianwei Zhang, Yang Liu
papers.abstract: Multi-Robot Systems (MRSs) show significant advantages to deal with complex tasks efficiently. However, the system complexity inevitably enlarges the attack surface and adds difficulty in guaranteeing the security and safety of MRSs. In this paper, we present an in-depth investigation about the Byzantine threats in MRSs, where some robot is untrusted. We design a practical methodology to identify potential Byzantine risks in a given MRS workload built from the Robot Operating System (ROS). It consists of three novel steps (requirement specification using signal temporal logic, attack surface determination via data-flow analysis, attack identification using requirement-driven fuzzing) to thoroughly assess MRS workloads. We use this fuzzing method to inspect five typical MRS workloads from past works and the ROS platform, and identify three novel kinds of attacks that can be launched with five attack strategies. We conduct comprehensive experiments in the Gazebo simulator and a real-world MRS with three TurtlBot3 robots to validate these attacks, which can remarkably decrease the system’s performance, or even cause task failures.
papers.abstract_zh: 多机器人系统在有效处理复杂任务方面显示出显著的优势。然而，系统的复杂性不可避免地扩大了攻击面，增加了保障MRSs安全的难度。在这篇文章中，我们对MRSs中的拜占庭威胁进行了深入的研究。我们设计了一种实用的方法来识别从机器人操作系统(ROS)构建的给定MRS工作负载中的潜在拜占庭风险。它包括三个新步骤(使用信号时序逻辑的需求说明、通过数据流分析的攻击面确定、使用需求驱动的模糊化的攻击识别)来彻底评估MRS工作负载。我们使用这种模糊化方法来检查来自过去作品和ROS平台的五种典型MRS工作负载，并识别出可以用五种攻击策略发起的三种新型攻击。我们在Gazebo模拟器和真实世界的MRS中用三个TurtlBot3机器人进行了全面的实验来验证这些攻击，这些攻击会显著降低系统的性能，甚至导致任务失败。
papers.title_zh: 多机器人系统中拜占庭威胁的研究

papers.title: SniffMislead: Non-Intrusive Privacy Protection against Wireless Packet Sniffers in Smart Homes
papers.authors: Xuanyu Liu, Qiang Zeng, Xiaojiang Du, Siva Likitha Valluru, Chenglong Fu, Xiao Fu, Bin Luo
papers.abstract: With the booming deployment of smart homes, concerns about user privacy keep growing. Recent research has shown that encrypted wireless traffic of IoT devices can be exploited by packet-sniffing attacks to reveal users’ privacy-sensitive information (e.g., the time when residents leave their home and go to work), which may be used to launch further attacks (e.g., a break-in). To address the growing concerns, we propose SniffMislead, a non-intrusive (i.e., without modifying IoT devices, hubs, or platforms) privacy-protecting approach, based on packet injection, against wireless packet sniffers. Instead of randomly injecting packets, which is ineffective against a smarter attacker, SniffMislead proposes the notion of phantom users, “people” who do not exist in the physical world. From an attacker’s perspective, however, they are perceived as real users. SniffMislead places multiple phantom users in a smart home, which can effectively prevent an attacker from inferring useful information. We design a top-down approach to synthesize phantom users’ behaviors, construct the sequence of decoy device events and commands, and then inject corresponding packets into the home. We show how SniffMislead ensures logical integrity and contextual consistency of injected packets, as well as how it makes a phantom user indistinguishable from a real user. Our evaluation results from a smart home testbed demonstrate that SniffMislead significantly reduces an attacker’s privacy-inferring capabilities, bringing the accuracy from 94.8% down to 3.5%.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着智能家居的蓬勃发展，对用户隐私的担忧不断增加。最近的研究表明，物联网设备的加密无线流量可以被数据包嗅探攻击所利用，从而泄露用户的隐私敏感信息(例如，居民离家上班的时间)，这些信息可能被用来发起进一步的攻击(例如，闯入)。为了解决日益增长的问题，我们提出了sniff misselling，这是一种非侵入性(即不修改物联网设备、集线器或平台)的隐私保护方法，基于数据包注入，针对无线数据包嗅探器。SniffMislead提出了幻影用户的概念，即在现实世界中不存在的“人”，而不是随机注入数据包，这对于更聪明的攻击者来说是无效的。然而，从攻击者的角度来看，他们被视为真正的用户。SniffMislead将多个幻影用户放置在一个智能家居中，可以有效防止攻击者推断出有用的信息。我们设计了一种自上而下的方法来合成幻影用户的行为，构造诱饵设备事件和命令的序列，然后将相应的数据包注入到家庭中。我们展示了SniffMislead如何确保注入包的逻辑完整性和上下文一致性，以及它如何使虚幻用户与真实用户无法区分。我们在智能家居测试床上的评估结果表明，sniff mismally显著降低了攻击者的隐私推断能力，将准确率从94.8%降至3.5%。
papers.title_zh: Sniffers误导:智能家居中针对无线数据包嗅探器的非侵入式隐私保护

papers.title: BSOD: Binary-only Scalable fuzzing Of device Drivers
papers.authors: Dominik Christian Maier, Fabian Toepfer
papers.abstract: Operating system code interacting with the devices attached to our computers, device drivers, are often provided by their respective vendors. As they may run with kernel privileges, this effectively means that kernel code is written by third parties. Some of these may not live up to the high security standards the core kernel code abides by. A single bug in a driver can harm the complete operating system’s integrity, just as if the bug was in the kernel itself. Attackers can exploit these bugs to escape sandboxes and to gain system privileges. Automated security testing of device drivers is hard. It depends on the attached device, and the driver code is not freely available. Dependency on a physical device increases the complexity even further. To alleviate these issues, we present BSOD, a fuzzing framework for high-complexity device drivers, based on KVM-VMI. BSOD retargets the well-known and battle-proven fuzzers, Syzkaller and AFL-2++, for binary-only drivers. We do not depend on vendor-specific CPU features and exceed 10k execs/sec on COTS hardware for coverage-guided kernel fuzzing. For evaluation, we focus on the highly complex closed-source drivers of a major graphics-card vendor for multiple operating systems. To overcome the strict hardware dependency of device driver fuzzing, making scaling impractical, we implement BSOD-fakedev, a virtual record & replay device, able to load a full graphics card driver without a physical device attached. It allows to scale fuzz campaigns to a large number of machines without the need for additional hardware. BSOD was able to uncover numerous bugs in graphics card drivers on Windows, Linux, and FreeBSD.
papers.abstract_zh: 与连接到我们计算机的设备交互的操作系统代码、设备驱动程序通常由它们各自的供应商提供。由于它们可能以内核权限运行，这实际上意味着内核代码是由第三方编写的。其中一些可能达不到核心内核代码遵守的高安全性标准。驱动程序中的一个小错误就可能损害整个操作系统的完整性，就好像这个错误存在于内核本身一样。攻击者可以利用这些漏洞逃离沙箱并获得系统权限。设备驱动程序的自动化安全测试很难。它取决于所连接的设备，并且驱动程序代码不是免费提供的。对物理设备的依赖进一步增加了复杂性。为了缓解这些问题，我们提出了BSOD，一个基于KVM-VMI的高复杂性设备驱动程序的模糊框架。BSOD将著名的、久经考验的模糊器Syzkaller和AFL-2++重新定位于二进制驱动程序。我们不依赖于特定于供应商的CPU特性，并在COTS硬件上超过10k execs/秒，用于覆盖导向的内核模糊化。为了进行评估，我们将重点放在一家主要显卡厂商针对多种操作系统的高度复杂的闭源驱动程序上。为了克服设备驱动程序模糊的严格硬件依赖性，使缩放不切实际，我们实现了BSOD-法克德夫，一个虚拟记录和重放设备，能够加载一个完整的显卡驱动程序，而无需连接物理设备。它允许将模糊活动扩展到大量机器，而不需要额外的硬件。BSOD发现了Windows、Linux和FreeBSD上显卡驱动程序的许多错误。
papers.title_zh: BSOD:设备驱动程序的二进制可伸缩模糊化

papers.title: LeanSym: Efficient Hybrid Fuzzing Through Conservative Constraint Debloating
papers.authors: Xianya Mi, Sanjay Rawat, Cristiano Giuffrida, Herbert Bos
papers.abstract: To improve code coverage and flip complex program branches, hybrid fuzzers couple fuzzing with concolic execution. Despite its benefits, this strategy inherits the inherent slowness and memory bloat of concolic execution, due to path explosion and constraint solving. While path explosion has received much attention, constraint bloat (having to solve complex and unnecessary constraints) is much less studied. In this paper, we present LeanSym (LSym), an efficient hybrid fuzzer. LSym focuses on optimizing the core concolic component of hybrid fuzzing by conservatively eliminating constraint bloat without sacrificing concolic execution soundness. The key idea is to partially symbolize the input and the program in order to remove unnecessary constraints accumulated during execution and significantly speed up the fuzzing process. In particular, we use taint analysis to identify the bytes that may influence the branches that we want to flip and symbolize only those bytes to minimize the constraints to collect. Furthermore, we eliminate non-trivial constraints introduced by environment modelling for system I/O. This is done by targeting the concolic analysis solely to library function-level tracing. We show this simple approach is effective and can be implemented in a modular fashion on top of off-the-shelf binary analysis tools. In particular, with only 1k LOC to implement simple branch/seed selection policies for hybrid fuzzing on top of unmodified Triton, libdft, and AFL, LSym outperforms state-of-the-art hybrid fuzzers with much less memory bloat, including those with advanced branch/seed selection policies or heavily optimized concolic execution engines such as QSYM and derivatives. On average, LSym outperforms QSYM by 7.61% in coverage, while finding bugs 4.79x faster in 18 applications of Google Fuzzer Test Suite. In real-world application testing, LSym reported 17 new bugs in 5 applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了提高代码覆盖率和翻转复杂的程序分支，混合模糊化器将模糊化与concolic执行结合起来。尽管有其优点，但由于路径爆炸和约束求解，这种策略继承了concolic执行固有的缓慢和内存膨胀。虽然路径爆炸受到了很多关注，但是约束膨胀(必须解决复杂和不必要的约束)却很少被研究。本文提出了一种高效的混合模糊器LeanSym (LSym)。LSym专注于优化混合模糊化的核心concolic组件，在不牺牲concolic执行可靠性的情况下，保守地消除约束膨胀。关键思想是部分符号化输入和程序，以消除执行过程中积累的不必要的约束，并显著加快模糊化过程。特别是，我们使用污点分析来识别可能影响我们想要翻转的分支的字节，并且只符号化那些字节以最小化要收集的约束。此外，我们消除了由系统I/O的环境建模引入的重要约束。这是通过将concolic分析仅定位于库函数级跟踪来实现的。我们证明了这种简单的方法是有效的，并且可以在现成的二进制分析工具上以模块化的方式实现。特别是，LSym在未经修改的Triton、libdft和AFL上仅使用1k LOC来实现简单的分支/种子选择策略，其性能优于内存膨胀少得多的一流混合模糊器，包括那些具有高级分支/种子选择策略或高度优化的concolic执行引擎(如QSYM及其衍生物)的模糊器。平均而言，LSym在覆盖率方面优于QSYM 7.61%，而在Google Fuzzer测试套件的18个应用中，找到bug的速度快了4.79倍。在现实世界的应用程序测试中，LSym报告了5个应用程序中的17个新错误。
papers.title_zh: LeanSym:通过保守约束去模糊的有效混合模糊

papers.title: UFuzzer: Lightweight Detection of PHP-Based Unrestricted File Upload Vulnerabilities Via Static-Fuzzing Co-Analysis
papers.authors: Jin Huang, Junjie Zhang, Jialun Liu, Chuang Li, Rui Dai
papers.abstract: Unrestricted file upload vulnerabilities enable attackers to upload malicious scripts to a web server for later execution. We have built a system, namely UFuzzer, to effectively and automatically detect such vulnerabilities in PHP-based server-side web programs. Different from existing detection methods that use either static program analysis or fuzzing, UFuzzer integrates both (i.e., static-fuzzing co-analysis). Specifically, it leverages static program analysis to generate executable code templates that compactly and effectively summarize the vulnerability-relevant semantics of a server-side web application. UFuzzer then “fuzzes” these templates in a local, native PHP runtime environment for vulnerability detection. Compared to static-analysis-based methods, UFuzzer preserves the semantics of an analyzed program more effectively, resulting in higher detection performance. Different from fuzzing-based methods, UFuzzer exercises each generated code template locally, thereby reducing the analysis overhead and meanwhile eliminating the need of operating web services. Experiments using real-world data have demonstrated that UFuzzer outperforms existing methods in either efficiency, or accuracy, or both. In addition, it has detected 31 unknown vulnerable PHP scripts including 5 CVEs.
papers.abstract_zh: 不受限制的文件上传漏洞使得攻击者能够将恶意脚本上传到web服务器供以后执行。我们已经建立了一个系统，即UFuzzer，可以有效地自动检测基于PHP的服务器端web程序中的此类漏洞。与使用静态程序分析或模糊化的现有检测方法不同，UFuzzer集成了两者(即静态-模糊化联合分析)。具体来说，它利用静态程序分析来生成可执行代码模板，这些模板简洁有效地总结了服务器端web应用程序的漏洞相关语义。UFuzzer然后在本地、原生PHP运行时环境中“模糊化”这些模板以进行漏洞检测。与基于静态分析的方法相比，UFuzzer更有效地保留了被分析程序的语义，从而提高了检测性能。与基于fuzzing的方法不同，UFuzzer在本地执行每个生成的代码模板，从而减少了分析开销，同时消除了操作web服务的需要。使用真实世界数据的实验表明，UFuzzer在效率或准确性或两者方面都优于现有方法。此外，它还检测到31个未知的易受攻击的PHP脚本，包括5个CVE。
papers.title_zh: UFuzzer:通过静态模糊联合分析对基于PHP的无限制文件上传漏洞进行轻量级检测

papers.title: SecureFS: A Secure File System for Intel SGX
papers.authors: Sandeep Kumar, Smruti R. Sarangi
papers.abstract: A trusted execution environment or a TEE facilitates the secure execution of an application on a remote untrusted server. In a TEE, the confidentiality, integrity, and freshness properties for the code and data hold throughout the execution. In a TEE setting, specifically Intel SGX, even the operating system (OS) is not trusted. This results in certain limitations of a secure application’s functionality, such as no access to the file system and network – as it requires OS support. Prior works have focused on alleviating this problem by allowing an application to access the file system securely. However, we show that they are susceptible to replay attacks, where replaying an old encrypted version of a file may remain undetected. Furthermore, they do not consider the impact of Intel SGX operations on the design of the file system. To this end, we present SecureFS, a secure, efficient, and scalable file system for Intel SGX that ensures confidentiality, integrity, and freshness of the data stored in it. SecureFS can work with unmodified binaries. SecureFS also considers the impact of Intel SGX to ensure optimal performance. We implement a prototype of SecureFS on a real Intel SGX machine. We incur a minimal overhead () over the current state-of-the-art techniques while adding freshness to the list of security guarantees.
papers.abstract_zh: 可信执行环境或TEE有助于在远程不可信服务器上安全执行应用程序。在TEE中，代码和数据的机密性、完整性和新鲜性在整个执行过程中保持不变。在TEE环境中，尤其是在SGX，甚至连操作系统(OS)都不可信。这导致安全应用程序的功能受到某些限制，例如无法访问文件系统和网络，因为它需要操作系统的支持。先前的工作集中于通过允许应用程序安全地访问文件系统来缓解这个问题。然而，我们表明它们容易受到重放攻击，重放旧的加密版本的文件可能仍然未被检测到。此外，他们没有考虑英特尔SGX运营对文件系统设计的影响。为此，我们推出了SecureFS，这是一款面向SGX的安全、高效且可扩展的文件系统，可确保存储数据的机密性、完整性和新鲜度。SecureFS可以处理未修改的二进制文件。SecureFS还考虑了SGX的影响，以确保最佳性能。我们在一台真实的英特尔SGX机器上实现了一个SecureFS原型。我们在当前最先进的技术上产生了最小的开销()，同时给安全保证列表增加了新鲜感。
papers.title_zh: SecureFS:英特尔SGX的安全文件系统

papers.title: BasicBlocker: ISA Redesign to Make Spectre-Immune CPUs Faster
papers.authors: Jan Philipp Thoma, Jakob Feldtkeller, Markus Krausz, Tim Güneysu, Daniel J. Bernstein
papers.abstract: Recent research has revealed an ever-growing class of microarchitectural attacks that exploit speculative execution, a standard feature in modern processors. Proposed and deployed countermeasures involve a variety of compiler updates, firmware updates, and hardware updates. None of the deployed countermeasures have convincing security arguments, and many of them have already been broken. The obvious way to simplify the analysis of speculative-execution attacks is to eliminate speculative execution. This is normally dismissed as being unacceptably expensive, but the underlying cost analyses consider only software written for current instruction-set architectures, so they do not rule out the possibility of a new instruction-set architecture providing acceptable performance without speculative execution. A new ISA requires compiler and hardware updates, but these are happening in any case. This paper introduces BasicBlocker, a generic ISA modification that works for all common ISAs and that allows non-speculative CPUs to obtain most of the performance benefit that would have been provided by speculative execution. To demonstrate the feasibility of BasicBlocker, this paper defines a variant of the RISC-V ISA called BBRISC-V and provides a thorough evaluation on both a 5-stage in-order soft core and a superscalar out-of-order processor using an associated compiler and a variety of benchmarks.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的研究揭示了一种不断增长的微体系结构攻击，这种攻击利用了投机性执行，这是现代处理器的一个标准特性。提议和部署的对策涉及各种编译器更新、固件更新和硬件更新。部署的对策没有一个有令人信服的安全论据，其中许多已经被攻破。简化推测执行攻击分析的明显方法是消除推测执行。这通常被认为是不可接受的昂贵，但基本的成本分析只考虑为当前指令集体系结构编写的软件，因此它们不排除新的指令集体系结构提供可接受的性能而没有推测性执行的可能性。一个新的ISA需要编译器和硬件的更新，但是这些在任何情况下都会发生。本文介绍了BasicBlocker，这是一个通用的ISA修改，适用于所有常见的ISA，并允许非推测性CPU获得推测性执行所提供的大部分性能优势。为了证明BasicBlocker的可行性，本文定义了一种称为BBRISC-V的RISC-V ISA变体，并使用相关的编译器和各种基准对5级有序软核和超标量无序处理器进行了全面的评估。
papers.title_zh: BasicBlocker: ISA重新设计，使不受Spectre影响的CPU速度更快

papers.title: Fast Intra-kernel Isolation and Security with IskiOS
papers.authors: Spyridoula Gravani, Mohammad Hedayati, John Criswell, Michael L. Scott
papers.abstract: The kernels of operating systems such as Windows, Linux, and MacOS are vulnerable to control-flow hijacking. Defenses exist, but many require efficient intra-address-space isolation. Execute-only memory, for example, requires read protection on code segments, and shadow stacks require protection from buffer overwrites. Intel’s Protection Keys for Userspace (PKU) could, in principle, provide the intra-kernel isolation needed by such defenses, but, when used as designed, it applies only to user-mode application code. This paper presents an unconventional approach to memory protection, allowing PKU to be used within the operating system kernel on existing Intel hardware, replacing the traditional user/supervisor isolation mechanism and, simultaneously, enabling efficient intra-kernel isolation. We call the resulting mechanism Protection Keys for Kernelspace (PKK). To demonstrate its utility and efficiency, we present a system we call IskiOS: a Linux variant featuring execute-only memory (XOM) and the first-ever race-free shadow stacks for x86-64. Experiments with the LMBench kernel microbenchmarks display a geometric mean overhead of about 11% for PKK and no additional overhead for XOM. IskiOS’s shadow stacks bring the total to 22%. For full applications, experiments with the system benchmarks of the Phoronix test suite display negligible overhead for PKK and XOM, and less than 5% geometric mean overhead for shadow stacks.
papers.abstract_zh: Windows、Linux和MacOS等操作系统的内核容易受到控制流劫持的攻击。防御措施是存在的，但是很多都需要有效的地址空间内部隔离。例如，只执行内存需要对代码段进行读保护，而影子堆栈需要防止缓冲区覆盖。英特尔的用户空间保护密钥(PKU)原则上可以提供这种防御所需的内核内隔离，但是，当按设计使用时，它仅适用于用户模式应用程序代码。本文介绍了一种非常规的内存保护方法，允许在现有英特尔硬件上的操作系统内核中使用PKU，取代传统的用户/管理员隔离机制，同时实现高效的内核内隔离。我们称由此产生的机制为Kernelspace (PKK)的保护密钥。为了展示它的实用性和效率，我们展示了一个我们称之为IskiOS的系统:一个Linux变种，具有只执行内存(XOM)和有史以来第一个用于x86-64的无竞争影子堆栈。对LMBench内核微基准测试的实验显示，PKK的几何平均开销约为11%,而XOM没有额外开销。IskiOS的影子堆栈使总数达到22%。对于完整的应用程序，使用Phoronix测试套件的系统基准进行的实验显示，PKK和XOM的开销可以忽略不计，shadow stacks的开销小于5%。
papers.title_zh: 使用IskiOS实现快速内核内隔离和安全性

papers.title: Encryption is Futile: Reconstructing 3D-Printed Models Using the Power Side-Channel
papers.authors: Jacob Gatlin, Sofia Belikovetsky, Yuval Elovici, Anthony Skjellum, Joshua Lubell, Paul Witherell, Mark Yampolskiy
papers.abstract: Outsourced Additive Manufacturing (AM) exposes sensitive design data to external malicious actors. Even with end-to-end encryption between the design owner and 3D-printer, side-channel attacks can be used to bypass cyber-security measures and obtain the underlying design. In this paper, we develop a method based on the power side-channel that enables accurate design reconstruction in the face of full encryption measures without any prior knowledge of the design. Our evaluation on a Fused Deposition Modeling (FDM) 3D Printer has shown 99 % accuracy in reconstruction, a significant improvement on the state of the art. This approach demonstrates the futility of pure cyber-security measures applied to Additive Manufacturing.
papers.abstract_zh: 外包增材制造(AM)将敏感的设计数据暴露给外部恶意参与者。即使在设计所有者和3D打印机之间进行端到端加密，侧信道攻击也可以用来绕过网络安全措施，获得底层设计。在本文中，我们开发了一种基于功率侧信道的方法，该方法能够在面对完全加密措施时进行准确的设计重构，而无需任何设计先验知识。我们对熔融沉积成型(FDM) 3D打印机的评估显示，重建准确率达到99 %，这是对当前技术水平的重大改进。这种方法证明了纯网络安全措施应用于增材制造的无用性。
papers.title_zh: 加密是徒劳的:使用Power Side-Channel重建3D打印模型

papers.title: DisCo: Combining Disassemblers for Improved Performance
papers.authors: Sri Shaila G, Ahmad Darki, Michalis Faloutsos, Nael B. Abu-Ghazaleh, Manu Sridharan
papers.abstract: Malware infects thousands of systems globally each day causing millions of dollars in damages. Which disassembler should a malware analyst choose in order to get the most accurate disassembly and be able to detect, analyze and defuse malware quickly? There is no clear answer to this question: (a) the performance of disassemblers varies across configurations, and (b) most prior work on disassemblers focuses on benign software and the x86 CPU architecture. In this work, we take a different approach and ask: why not use all the disassemblers instead of picking one? We present DisCo, a novel and effective approach to harness the collective capability of a group of disassemblers combining their output into an ensemble consensus. We develop and evaluate our approach using 1760 IoT malware binaries compiled with different compilers and compiler options for the ARM and MIPS architectures. First, we show that DisCo can combine the collective wisdom of disassemblers effectively. For example, our approach outperforms the best contributing disassembler by as much as 17.8% in the F1 score for function start identification for MIPS binaries compiled using GCC with O3 option. Second, the collective wisdom of the disassemblers can be brought back to improve each disassembler. As a proof of concept, we show that byte-level signatures identified by DisCo can improve the performance of Ghidra by as much as 13.6% in terms of the F1 score. Third, we quantify the effect of the architecture, the compiler, and the compiler options on the performance of disassemblers. Finally, the systematic evaluation within our approach led to a bug discovery in Ghidra v9.1, which was acknowledged by the Ghidra team.
papers.abstract_zh: 恶意软件每天感染全球数千个系统，造成数百万美元的损失。恶意软件分析师应该选择哪种反汇编程序才能获得最准确的反汇编，并能够快速检测、分析和消除恶意软件？这个问题没有明确的答案:(a)反汇编程序的性能因配置而异，以及(b)大多数关于反汇编程序的现有工作集中在良性软件和x86 CPU体系结构上。在这项工作中，我们采取了不同的方法，并问:为什么不使用所有的反汇编程序，而不是选择一个？我们提出了DisCo，一种新颖有效的方法来利用一组反汇编者的集体能力，将他们的输出组合成一个集合共识。我们使用1760个物联网恶意软件二进制文件来开发和评估我们的方法，这些二进制文件使用ARM和MIPS架构的不同编译器和编译器选项进行编译。首先，我们证明了DisCo可以有效地结合反汇编者的集体智慧。例如，对于使用带有O3选项的GCC编译的MIPS二进制文件，我们的方法在函数开始识别的F1分数上比最好的反汇编器高出17.8%。第二，可以利用拆卸者的集体智慧来改进每个拆卸者。作为概念验证，我们表明由DisCo识别的字节级签名可以在F1分数方面将Ghidra的性能提高多达13.6%。第三，我们量化了体系结构、编译器和编译器选项对反汇编器性能的影响。最后，我们方法中的系统评估导致了Ghidra v9.1中的一个bug发现，这一点得到了Ghidra团队的认可。
papers.title_zh: DisCo:组合反汇编程序以提高性能

papers.title: iTOP: Automating Counterfeit Object-Oriented Programming Attacks
papers.authors: Paul Muntean, Richard Viehoever, Zhiqiang Lin, Gang Tan, Jens Grossklags, Claudia Eckert
papers.abstract: Exploiting a program requires a security analyst to manipulate data in program memory with the goal to obtain control over the program counter and to escalate privileges. However, this is a tedious and lengthy process as: (1) the analyst has to massage program data such that a logical reliable data passing chain can be established, and (2) depending on the attacker goal certain in-place fine-grained protection mechanisms need to be bypassed. Previous work has proposed various techniques to facilitate exploit development. Unfortunately, none of them can be easily used to address the given challenges. This is due to the fact that data in memory is difficult to be massaged by an analyst who does not know the peculiarities of the program as the attack specification is most of the time only textually available, and not automated at all. In this paper, we present indirect transfer oriented programming (iTOP), a framework to automate the construction of control-flow hijacking attacks in the presence of strong protections including control flow integrity, data execution prevention, and stack canaries. Given a vulnerable program, iTOP automatically builds an exploit payload with a chain of viable gadgets with solved SMT-based memory constraints. One salient feature of iTOP is that it contains 13 attack primitives powered by a Turing complete payload specification language, ESL. It also combines virtual and non-virtual gadgets using COOP-like dispatchers. As such, when searching for gadget chains, iTOP can respect, for example, a previously enforced CFI policy, by using only legitimate control flow transfers. We have evaluated iTOP with a variety of programs and demonstrated that it can successfully generate exploits with the developed attack primitives.
papers.abstract_zh: 利用程序需要安全分析师操纵程序内存中的数据，目的是获得对程序计数器的控制并提升权限。然而，这是一个乏味而冗长的过程，因为:(1)分析员必须处理程序数据，以便能够建立逻辑上可靠的数据传递链，以及(2)根据攻击者的目标，需要绕过某些适当的细粒度保护机制。先前的工作已经提出了各种技术来促进利用开发。不幸的是，它们中没有一个能被轻易地用来解决给定的挑战。这是因为内存中的数据很难被不知道程序特性的分析师处理，因为攻击规范大部分时间只能通过文本获得，根本不是自动的。在本文中，我们提出了间接面向传输编程(iTOP)，这是一个在存在强保护(包括控制流完整性、数据执行保护和堆栈加那利)的情况下自动构造控制流劫持攻击的框架。给定一个易受攻击的程序，iTOP会自动构建一个漏洞利用有效载荷，其中包含一系列可行的小工具，这些小工具解决了基于SMT的内存限制。iTOP的一个显著特征是它包含13个由图灵完整有效载荷规范语言ESL支持的攻击原语。它还使用类似COOP的调度程序将虚拟和非虚拟小工具结合起来。因此，当搜索小工具链时，iTOP可以通过仅使用合法的控制流传输来尊重例如先前实施的CFI策略。我们已经用各种程序对iTOP进行了评估，并证明了它可以利用开发的攻击原语成功地产生漏洞。
papers.title_zh: iTOP:自动化伪造的面向对象编程攻击

papers.title: Lost in the Loader: The Many Faces of the Windows PE File Format
papers.authors: Dario Nisi, Mariano Graziano, Yanick Fratantonio, Davide Balzarotti
papers.title_zh: 迷失在加载程序中:Windows PE文件格式的多面性

papers.title: Crafting Adversarial Example to Bypass Flow-&ML- based Botnet Detector via RL
papers.authors: Junnan Wang, Qixu Liu, Di Wu, Ying Dong, Xiang Cui
papers.abstract: Machine learning(ML)-based botnet detection methods have become mainstream in corporate practice. However, researchers have found that ML models are vulnerable to adversarial attacks, which can mislead the models by adding subtle perturbations to the sample. Due to the complexity of traffic samples and the special constraints that to keep malicious functions, no substantial research of adversarial ML has been conducted in the botnet detection field, where the evasion attacks caused by carefully crafted adversarial examples may directly make ML-based detectors unavailable and cause significant property damage. In this paper, we propose a reinforcement learning(RL) method for bypassing ML-based botnet detectors. Specifically, we train an RL agent as a functionality-preserving botnet flow modifier through a series of interactions with the detector in a black-box scenario. This enables the attacker to evade detection without modifying the botnet source code or affecting the botnet utility. Experiments on 14 botnet families prove that our method has considerable evasion performance and time performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于机器学习(ML)的僵尸网络检测方法已经成为企业实践中的主流。然而，研究人员发现，ML模型容易受到对抗性攻击，这种攻击可以通过向样本添加微妙的扰动来误导模型。由于流量样本的复杂性和保持恶意功能的特殊约束，在僵尸网络检测领域还没有对恶意ML进行实质性的研究，其中由精心制作的恶意示例引起的规避攻击可能直接使基于ML的检测器不可用并导致重大的财产损失。本文提出了一种绕过基于最大似然的僵尸网络检测器的强化学习方法。具体来说，我们通过在黑盒场景中与检测器的一系列交互，将RL代理训练为功能保留僵尸网络流修改器。这使得攻击者能够在不修改僵尸网络源代码或影响僵尸网络实用程序的情况下逃避检测。在14个僵尸网络家族上的实验证明，该方法具有相当的规避性能和时间性能。
papers.title_zh: 通过RL创建对抗示例以绕过基于流和ML的僵尸网络检测器

papers.title: CADUE: Content-Agnostic Detection of Unwanted Emails for Enterprise Security
papers.authors: Mohamed Nabeel, Enes Altinisik, Haipei Sun, Issa Khalil, Wendy Hui Wang, Ting Yu
papers.abstract: End-to-end email encryption (E2EE) ensures that an email could only be decrypted and read by its intended recipients. E2EE’s strong security guarantee is particularly desirable for the enterprises in the event of breaches: even if attackers break into an email server, under E2EE no contents of emails are leaked. Meanwhile, E2EE brings significant challenges for an enterprise to detect and filter unwanted emails (spams and phishing emails). Most existing solutions rely heavily on email contents (i.e., email body and attachments), which would be difficult when email contents are encrypted. In this paper, we investigate how to detect unwanted emails in a content-agnostic manner, that is, without access to the contents of emails at all. Our key observation is that the communication patterns and relationships among internal users of an enterprise contain rich and reliable information about benign email communications. Combining such information with other metadata of emails (headers and subjects when available), unwanted emails can be accurately distinguished from legitimate ones without access to email contents. Specifically, we propose two types of novel enterprise features from enterprise email logs: sender profiling features, which capture the patterns of past emails from external senders to internal recipients; and enterprise graph features, which capture the co-recipient and the sender-recipient relationships between internal users. We design a classifier utilizing the above features along with existing meta-data features. We run extensive experiments over a real-world enterprise email dataset, and show that our approach, even without any content-based features, achieves high true positive rate of 95.2% and low false positive rate of 0.3% with such stringent constraints.
papers.abstract_zh: 端到端电子邮件加密(E2EE)可确保电子邮件只能由目标收件人解密和阅读。E2EE强大的安全保障对于企业来说在发生违规事件时尤为可取:即使攻击者闯入电子邮件服务器，在E2EE下，电子邮件的内容也不会泄露。同时，E2EE为企业检测和过滤不需要的电子邮件(垃圾邮件和网络钓鱼电子邮件)带来了巨大的挑战。大多数现有解决方案严重依赖于电子邮件内容(即，电子邮件正文和附件)，当电子邮件内容被加密时，这将是困难的。在本文中，我们研究如何以内容不可知的方式检测不需要的电子邮件，也就是说，根本不需要访问电子邮件的内容。我们的主要观察结果是，企业内部用户之间的通信模式和关系包含关于良性电子邮件通信的丰富而可靠的信息。将此类信息与电子邮件的其他元数据(标题和主题，如果可用)相结合，可以在不访问电子邮件内容的情况下准确地区分不需要的电子邮件和合法的电子邮件。具体而言，我们从企业电子邮件日志中提出了两种新颖的企业特征:发件人特征，其捕获从外部发件人到内部收件人的过去电子邮件的模式；和企业图功能，这些功能捕获内部用户之间的共同收件人和发件人-收件人关系。我们设计了一个利用上述特征和现有元数据特征的分类器。我们在真实世界的企业电子邮件数据集上进行了大量实验，结果表明，即使没有任何基于内容的特征，我们的方法也可以在如此严格的约束下实现95.2%的高真阳性率和0.3%的低假阳性率。
papers.title_zh: CADUE:不受内容限制地检测不受欢迎的电子邮件，确保企业安全

papers.title: GrandDetAuto: Detecting Malicious Nodes in Large-Scale Autonomous Networks
papers.authors: Tigist Abera, Ferdinand Brasser, Lachlan J. Gunn, Patrick Jauernig, David Koisser, Ahmad-Reza Sadeghi
papers.abstract: Autonomous collaborative networks of devices are rapidly emerging in numerous domains, such as self-driving cars, smart factories, critical infrastructure, and Internet of Things in general. Although autonomy and self-organization are highly desired properties, they increase vulnerability to attacks. Hence, autonomous networks need dependable mechanisms to detect malicious devices in order to prevent compromise of the entire network. However, current mechanisms to detect malicious devices either require a trusted central entity or scale poorly. In this paper, we present GrandDetAuto, the first scheme to identify malicious devices efficiently within large autonomous networks of collaborating entities. GrandDetAuto functions without relying on a central trusted entity, works reliably for very large networks of devices, and is adaptable to a wide range of application scenarios thanks to interchangeable components. Our scheme uses random elections to embed integrity validation schemes in distributed consensus, providing a solution supporting tens of thousands of devices. We implemented and evaluated a concrete instance of GrandDetAuto on a network of embedded devices and conducted large-scale network simulations with up to 100 000 nodes. Our results show the effectiveness and efficiency of our scheme, revealing logarithmic growth in run-time and message complexity with increasing network size. Moreover, we provide an extensive evaluation of key parameters showing that GrandDetAuto is applicable to many scenarios with diverse requirements.
papers.abstract_zh: 设备的自主协作网络正在众多领域迅速涌现，如自动驾驶汽车、智能工厂、关键基础设施和物联网。虽然自治和自组织是非常需要的属性，但是它们增加了攻击的脆弱性。因此，自治网络需要可靠的机制来检测恶意设备，以防止整个网络受损。然而，当前检测恶意设备的机制要么需要可信的中央实体，要么扩展性差。在本文中，我们介绍了GrandDetAuto，这是第一个在大型自治协作实体网络中有效识别恶意设备的方案。GrandDetAuto的功能不依赖于中央可信实体，可靠地工作于非常大的设备网络，并且由于可互换的组件而适用于广泛的应用场景。我们的方案使用随机选举在分布式共识中嵌入完整性验证方案，提供支持数万个设备的解决方案。我们在嵌入式设备网络上实现和评估了GrandDetAuto的一个具体实例，并进行了多达100 000个节点的大规模网络模拟。我们的结果显示了我们的方案的有效性和效率，揭示了随着网络规模的增加，运行时间和消息复杂度的对数增长。此外，我们提供了对关键参数的广泛评估，表明GrandDetAuto适用于具有不同需求的许多场景。
papers.title_zh: GrandDetAuto:检测大规模自治网络中的恶意节点

papers.title: AttkFinder: Discovering Attack Vectors in PLC Programs using Information Flow Analysis
papers.authors: John Henry Castellanos, Martín Ochoa, Alvaro A. Cárdenas, Owen Arden, Jianying Zhou
papers.abstract: To protect an Industrial Control System (ICS), defenders need to identify potential attacks on the system and then design mechanisms to prevent them. Unfortunately, identifying potential attack conditions is a time-consuming and error-prone process. In this work, we propose and evaluate a set of tools to symbolically analyse the software of Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs) guided by an information flow analysis that takes into account PLC network communication (compositions). Our tools systematically analyse malicious network packets that may force the PLC to send specific control commands to actuators. We evaluate our approach in a real-world system controlling the dosing of chemicals for water treatment. Our tools are able to find 75 attack tactics (56 were novel attacks), and we confirm that 96% of these tactics cause the intended effect in our testbed.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了保护工业控制系统(ICS)，防御者需要识别对系统的潜在攻击，然后设计预防机制。不幸的是，识别潜在的攻击条件是一个耗时且容易出错的过程。在这项工作中，我们提出并评估了一套工具，以象征性地分析软件的可编程逻辑控制器(PLC)的指导下，信息流分析，考虑到PLC网络通信(组成)。我们的工具系统地分析恶意网络数据包，这些数据包可能会迫使PLC向执行器发送特定的控制命令。我们在一个控制水处理化学药品剂量的真实世界系统中评估了我们的方法。我们的工具能够找到75种攻击策略(56种是新攻击)，我们确认这些策略中有96%在我们的测试床上产生了预期的效果。
papers.title_zh: AttkFinder:使用信息流分析发现PLC程序中的攻击载体

papers.title: HandLock: Enabling 2-FA for Smart Home Voice Assistants using Inaudible Acoustic Signal
papers.authors: Shaohu Zhang, Anupam Das
papers.abstract: The use of voice-control technology has become mainstream and is growing worldwide. While voice assistants provide convenience through automation and control of home appliances, the open nature of the voice channel makes voice assistants difficult to secure. As a result voice assistants have been shown to be vulnerable to replay attacks, impersonation attacks and inaudible voice commands. Existing defenses do not provide a practical solution as they either rely on external hardware (e.g., motion sensors) or work under very constrained settings (e.g., holding the device close to a user’s mouth). We introduce the concept of using a gesture-based authentication system for smart home voice assistants called HandLock, which uses built-in microphones and speakers to generate and sense inaudible acoustic signals to detect the presence of a known (i.e., authorized) hand gesture. Our proposed approach can act as a second-factor authentication (2-FA) for performing specific sensitive operations like confirming online purchases through voice assistants. Through extensive experiments involving 45 participants, we show that HandLock can achieve on average 96.51% true-positive-rate (TPR) at the expense of 0.82% false-acceptance-rate (FAR). We perform a comprehensive analysis of HandLock under various settings to showcase its accuracy, stability, resilience to attacks, and usability. Our analysis shows that HandLock can not only successfully thwart impersonation attacks, but can do so while incurring very low overheads and is compatible with modern voice assistants.
papers.abstract_zh: 语音控制技术的使用已经成为主流，并在全球范围内不断增长。虽然语音助手通过自动化和控制家用电器提供了便利，但是语音信道的开放性质使得语音助手难以保护。因此，语音助手已被证明易受重放攻击、模仿攻击和听不见的语音命令的攻击。现有的防御没有提供实用的解决方案，因为它们或者依赖于外部硬件(例如，运动传感器)，或者在非常受限的设置下工作(例如，将设备靠近用户的嘴)。我们介绍了将基于手势的认证系统用于智能家居语音助理HandLock的概念，该系统使用内置麦克风和扬声器来产生和感知听不见的声音信号，以检测已知(即授权)手势的存在。我们提出的方法可以作为第二因素认证(2-FA ),用于执行特定的敏感操作，如通过语音助手确认在线购买。通过涉及45名参与者的大量实验，我们表明HandLock可以以0.82%的错误接受率(FAR)为代价获得平均96.51%的真阳性率(TPR)。我们在各种设置下对HandLock进行了全面的分析，以展示其准确性、稳定性、抵御攻击的能力和可用性。我们的分析表明，HandLock不仅可以成功地阻止假冒攻击，而且可以在产生非常低的开销的同时做到这一点，并且与现代语音助手兼容。
papers.title_zh: HandLock:使用听不见的声音信号为智能家居语音助理启用2-FA

papers.title: What Did You Add to My Additive Manufacturing Data?: Steganographic Attacks on 3D Printing Files
papers.authors: Mark Yampolskiy, Lynne Graves, Jacob Gatlin, Anthony Skjellum, Moti Yung
papers.abstract: Additive Manufacturing (AM) adoption is increasing in home and industrial settings, but information security for this technology is still immature. Thus far, three security threat categories have been identified: technical data theft, sabotage, and illegal part manufacturing. In this paper, we expand to a new threat category: misuse of digital design files as a subliminal communication channel. We identify and explore attacks by which arbitrary information can be embedded steganographically in the most common digital design file format, the STL, without distorting the printed object. Because the technique will not change the manufactured object’s geometry, it is likely to remain unnoticed and can be exploited for data transfer. Further, even with knowledge of our methods, defenders cannot distinguish between actual data transfer and random manipulation of the files. This is the first info-hiding attack on this system, conducted despite the fact that random changes may spoil the physical artifact and result in detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 在家庭和工业环境中，增材制造(AM)的采用越来越多，但这项技术的信息安全仍不成熟。到目前为止，已经确定了三种安全威胁类别:技术数据盗窃、破坏和非法部件制造。在本文中，我们扩展到一个新的威胁类别:滥用数字设计文件作为潜意识沟通渠道。我们识别并探索了一些攻击，通过这些攻击，可以在最常见的数字设计文件格式STL中隐写嵌入任意信息，而不会扭曲打印对象。因为这种技术不会改变制造对象的几何形状，所以它很可能不会被注意到，并可用于数据传输。此外，即使知道我们的方法，防御者也无法区分实际的数据传输和对文件的随机操作。这是对该系统的第一次信息隐藏攻击，尽管随机变化可能会破坏物理制品并导致检测。
papers.title_zh: 你在我的增材制造数据中添加了什么？:对3D打印文件的隐写攻击

papers.title: Practical Speech Re-use Prevention in Voice-driven Services
papers.authors: Yangyong Zhang, Sunpreet S. Arora, Maliheh Shirvanian, Jianwei Huang, Guofei Gu
papers.abstract: Voice-driven services (VDS) are being used in a variety of applications ranging from smart home control to payments using digital assistants. The input to such services is often captured via an open voice channel, e.g., using a microphone, in an unsupervised setting. One of the key operational security requirements in such setting is the freshness of the input speech. We present AEOLUS, a security overlay that proactively embeds a dynamic acoustic nonce at the time of user interaction, and detects the presence of the embedded nonce in the recorded speech to ensure freshness. We demonstrate that acoustic nonce can (i) be reliably embedded and retrieved, and (ii) be non-disruptive (and even imperceptible) to a VDS user. Optimal parameters (acoustic nonce’s operating frequency, amplitude, and bitrate) are determined for (i) and (ii) from a practical perspective. Experimental results show that AEOLUS yields 0.5% FRR at 0% FAR for speech re-use prevention upto a distance of 4 meters in three real-world environments with different background noise levels. We also conduct a user study with 120 participants, which shows that the acoustic nonce does not degrade overall user experience for 94.16% of speech samples, on average, in these environments. AEOLUS can therefore be used in practice to prevent speech re-use and ensure the freshness of speech input.
papers.abstract_zh: 语音驱动服务(VDS)正被用于从智能家居控制到使用数字助理支付的各种应用中。对这种服务的输入通常是在无人监管的环境下通过开放的语音通道(例如，使用麦克风)捕获的。在这种设置中，关键的操作安全性要求之一是输入语音的新鲜度。我们提出了AEOLUS，一种在用户交互时主动嵌入动态声学随机数的安全覆盖，并检测录制语音中嵌入随机数的存在以确保新鲜度。我们证明了声学随机数可以(I)被可靠地嵌入和检索，以及(ii)对VDS用户没有破坏性(甚至是察觉不到的)。从实用的角度来看，为(I)和(ii)确定最佳参数(声学随机数的工作频率、振幅和比特率)。实验结果表明，在具有不同背景噪声水平的三个真实世界环境中，AEOLUS在0% FAR下产生0.5%的FRR，用于4米距离内的语音重用防止。我们还进行了一项有120名参与者的用户研究，研究表明，在这些环境中，平均94.16%的语音样本的声学随机数不会降低整体用户体验。因此，AEOLUS可在实践中用于防止语音重复使用，并确保语音输入的新鲜度。
papers.title_zh: 语音驱动服务中的实用语音重用预防

papers.title: μSCOPE: A Methodology for Analyzing Least-Privilege Compartmentalization in Large Software Artifacts
papers.authors: Nick Roessler, Lucas Atayde, Imani Palmer, Derrick Paul McKee, Jai Pandey, Vasileios P. Kemerlis, Mathias Payer, Adam Bates, Jonathan M. Smith, André DeHon, Nathan Dautenhahn
papers.abstract: By prioritizing simplicity and portability, least-privilege engineering has been an afterthought in OS design, resulting in monolithic kernels where any exploit leads to total compromise. μSCOPE (“microscope”) addresses this problem by automatically identifying opportunities for least-privilege separation. μSCOPE replaces expert-driven, semi-automated analysis with a general methodology for exploring a continuum of security vs. performance design points by adopting a quantitative and systematic approach to privilege analysis. We apply the μSCOPE methodology to the Linux kernel by (1) instrumenting the entire kernel to gain comprehensive, fine-grained memory access and call activity; (2) mapping these accesses to semantic information; and (3) conducting separability analysis on the kernel using both quantitative privilege and overhead metrics. We discover opportunities for orders of magnitude privilege reduction while predicting relatively low overheads—at 15% mediation overhead, overprivilege in Linux can be reduced up to 99.8%—suggesting fine-grained privilege separation is feasible and laying the groundwork for accelerating real privilege separation.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过优先考虑简单性和可移植性，最低特权工程已经成为OS设计中的一个事后想法，导致了单片内核，其中任何利用都会导致全面的危害。μSCOPE(“显微镜”)通过自动识别最低权限分离的机会来解决这个问题。μSCOPE通过采用量化和系统化的方法进行权限分析，用一种通用方法取代专家驱动的半自动分析，探索安全性与性能设计点的连续性。我们通过以下方式将μSCOPE方法应用于Linux内核:( 1)检测整个内核以获得全面、细粒度的内存访问和调用活动；(2)将这些访问映射到语义信息；以及(3)使用定量特权和开销度量对内核进行可分离性分析。我们发现了数量级特权减少的机会，同时预测相对较低的开销—在15%的中介开销下，Linux中的过度特权可以减少高达99.8%—这表明细粒度的特权分离是可行的，并为加速真正的特权分离奠定了基础。
papers.title_zh: μSCOPE:一种分析大型软件工件中最小特权划分的方法

papers.title: The Service Worker Hiding in Your Browser: The Next Web Attack Target?
papers.authors: Phakpoom Chinprutthiwong, Raj Vardhan, Guangliang Yang, Yangyong Zhang, Guofei Gu
papers.abstract: In recent years, service workers are gaining attention from both web developers and attackers due to the unique features they provide. Recent findings have shown that an attacker can register a malicious service worker to take advantage of the victim such as by turning the victim’s device into a crypto-currency miner. However, the possibility of benign service workers being leveraged is not well studied. To bridge this gap, we systematically analyze the security of service workers from a new perspective. Specifically, we consider how an attacker can leverage a benign service worker installed in popular websites. To this end, we uncover two attack channels – IndexedDB and Push notification. Through IndexedDB, an attacker can compromise a benign service worker and persistently control the vulnerable website. Likewise, push subscription can also be easily hijacked and used to track a user’s location. To understand the prevalence and security impacts of these attack channels, we conduct a measurement study on popular websites that deploy a service worker. Our results show 200 websites that are vulnerable to XSS attacks are also susceptible to push hijacking. We estimate the number of potential victims, who visit these susceptible websites and could be exposed to location tracking, to be up to 1.75 million users per month. Finally, we discuss potential defenses to prevent this problem from growing further.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，服务工作者因其提供的独特功能而受到web开发者和攻击者的关注。最近的发现表明，攻击者可以注册一个恶意的服务人员来利用受害者，例如通过将受害者的设备变成加密货币矿工。然而，良性服务工作者被利用的可能性没有被很好地研究。为了弥合这一差距，我们从一个新的角度系统地分析了服务工作者的安全问题。具体来说，我们考虑攻击者如何利用安装在流行网站中的良性服务工作者。为此，我们揭示了两种攻击渠道——索引数据库和推送通知。通过IndexedDB，攻击者可以危害一个良性的服务工作者，并持续控制易受攻击的网站。同样，推送订阅也很容易被劫持并用于跟踪用户的位置。为了了解这些攻击渠道的流行程度和安全影响，我们对部署了服务人员的热门网站进行了测量研究。我们的结果显示，200个易受XSS攻击的网站也容易受到推送劫持。我们估计，每月有多达175万用户会成为潜在的受害者，他们访问这些易受攻击的网站，并可能面临位置跟踪。最后，我们讨论了防止这个问题进一步恶化的潜在防御措施。
papers.title_zh: 隐藏在浏览器中的服务人员:下一个Web攻击目标？

papers.title: Designing Media Provenance Indicators to Combat Fake Media
papers.authors: Imani N. Sherman, Jack W. Stokes, Elissa M. Redmiles
papers.abstract: With the growth of technology that produces misinformation, there is a growing need to help users identify emerging types of fake media such as edited images and manipulated videos. In this work, we conduct a mixed-methods investigation into how we can provide provenance indicators to assist users in detecting newer forms of fake media. Specifically, we interview users regarding their experiences with different misinformation modes (text, image, video) to inform the design and content of indicators for previously unexplored media, especially fake videos. We find that media provenance – the source of the information – is a key heuristic used to evaluate all forms of fake media, and a heuristic that can be addressed by emerging technology. Thus, we subsequently design and investigate the use of provenance indicators to help users identify fake videos. We conduct a participatory design study to develop and design provenance indicators and evaluate participant-designed indicators via both expert evaluations and quantitative surveys (n=1,456) with end-users. Our results provide concrete design guidelines for the emerging issue of fake media. Our findings also raise concerns regarding users’ tendency to overgeneralize indicators used to assist users in identifying misinformation, suggesting the need for further research on warning design in the ongoing fight against misinformation.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着产生错误信息的技术的发展，越来越需要帮助用户识别新兴类型的虚假媒体，如经过编辑的图像和经过处理的视频。在这项工作中，我们进行了一项混合方法的调查，研究我们如何提供出处指标，以帮助用户检测新形式的假媒体。具体来说，我们采访了用户，了解他们对不同错误信息模式(文本、图像、视频)的体验，为之前未探索的媒体(尤其是虚假视频)的指标设计和内容提供信息。我们发现媒体出处——信息的来源——是一个用于评估所有形式的假媒体的关键启发，也是一个可以通过新兴技术解决的启发。因此，我们随后设计并研究了使用出处指示器来帮助用户识别假视频。我们开展了一项参与式设计研究，以开发和设计来源指标，并通过专家评估和最终用户的定量调查(n=1，456)评估参与者设计的指标。我们的结果为新出现的假媒体问题提供了具体的设计指南。我们的发现也引起了对用户倾向于过度概括用于帮助用户识别错误信息的指标的关注，表明在持续打击错误信息的过程中需要对警告设计进行进一步的研究。
papers.title_zh: 设计媒体出处指标，打击假媒体

papers.title: Marked for Disruption: Tracing the Evolution of Malware Delivery Operations Targeted for Takedown
papers.authors: Colin C. Ife, Yun Shen, Steven J. Murdoch, Gianluca Stringhini
papers.abstract: The malware and botnet phenomenon is among the most significant threats to cybersecurity today. Consequently, law enforcement agencies, security companies, and researchers are constantly seeking to disrupt these malicious operations through so-called takedown counter-operations. Unfortunately, the success of these takedowns is mixed. Furthermore, very little is understood as to how botnets and malware delivery operations respond to takedown attempts. We present a comprehensive study of three malware delivery operations that were targeted for takedown in 2015–16 using global download metadata provided by Symantec. In summary, we found that: (1) Distributed delivery architectures were commonly used, indicating the need for better security hygiene and coordination by the (ab)used service providers. (2) A minority of malware binaries were responsible for the majority of download activity, suggesting that detecting these “super binaries” would yield the most benefit to the security community. (3) The malware operations exhibited displacing and defiant behaviours following their respective takedown attempts. We argue that these “predictable” behaviours could be factored into future takedown strategies. (4) The malware operations also exhibited previously undocumented behaviours, such as Dridex dropping competing brands of malware, or Dorkbot and Upatre heavily relying on upstream dropper malware. These “unpredictable” behaviours indicate the need for researchers to use better threat-monitoring techniques.
papers.abstract_zh: 恶意软件和僵尸网络现象是当今网络安全面临的最大威胁之一。因此，执法机构、安全公司和研究人员一直在寻求通过所谓的拆除反操作来破坏这些恶意操作。不幸的是，这些扳倒的成功有好有坏。此外，人们对僵尸网络和恶意软件交付操作如何应对攻击企图知之甚少。我们使用赛门铁克提供的全球下载元数据，对2015年至2016年的三个恶意软件交付操作进行了全面的研究。总之，我们发现:(1)分布式交付体系结构被普遍使用，这表明(ab)使用的服务提供者需要更好的安全卫生和协调。(2)少数恶意软件二进制文件负责大多数下载活动，这表明检测这些“超级二进制文件”将为安全社区带来最大的好处。(3)恶意软件操作在其各自的攻击尝试之后表现出转移和反抗行为。我们认为，这些“可预测的”行为可以纳入未来的拆卸策略。(4)恶意软件操作还表现出以前未记录的行为，例如Dridex放弃竞争品牌的恶意软件，或者Dorkbot和Upatre严重依赖上游放弃者恶意软件。这些“不可预测”的行为表明研究人员需要使用更好的威胁监测技术。
papers.title_zh: 标记为中断:追踪恶意软件交付操作的演变

papers.title: The Evolution of DNS-based Email Authentication: Measuring Adoption and Finding Flaws
papers.authors: Dennis Tatang, Florian Zettl, Thorsten Holz
papers.abstract: Email is still one of the most common ways of communication in our digital world, the underlying Simple Mail Transport Protocol (SMTP) is crucial for our information society. Back when SMTP was developed, security goals for the exchanged messages did not play a major role in the protocol design, resulting in many types of design limitations and vulnerabilities. Especially spear-phishing campaigns take advantage of the fact that it is easy to spoof the originating email address to appear more trustworthy. Furthermore, trusted brands can be abused in email spam or phishing campaigns. Thus, if no additional authentication mechanisms protect a given domain, attackers can misuse the domain. To enable proper authentication, various extensions for SMTP were developed in the past years. In this paper, we analyze the three most common methods for originating DNS domain email authentication in a large-scale, longitudinal measurement study. Among other findings, we confirm that Sender Policy Framework (SPF) still constitutes the most widely used method for email authentication in practice. In general, we find that higher-ranked domains use more authentication mechanisms, but sometimes configuration errors emerge, e.g., we found that amazon.co.jp had an invalid SPF record. A trend analysis shows a (statistically significant) growing number of domains using SPF. Furthermore, we show that the Domain-based Message Authentication, Reporting and Conformance (DMARC) distribution evolved significantly as well by increasing tenfold over the last five years. However, is still far from being perfect with a total adoption rate of about 11%. The US and UK governmental domains are an exception, given that both have a high adoption rate due to binding legal directives. Finally, we study DomainKeys Identified Mail (DKIM) adoption in detail and find a lower bound of almost 13% for DKIM usage in practice. In addition, we reveal various flaws, such as weak or shared duplicate keys. As a whole, we find that about 3% of the domains use all three mechanisms in combination.
papers.abstract_zh: 电子邮件仍然是我们数字世界中最常见的通信方式之一，底层的简单邮件传输协议(SMTP)对我们的信息社会至关重要。在开发SMTP的时候，交换消息的安全目标在协议设计中并不重要，这导致了许多类型的设计限制和漏洞。尤其是鱼叉式网络钓鱼活动利用了这样一个事实，即很容易欺骗原始电子邮件地址，使其看起来更值得信任。此外，可信品牌可能会在垃圾邮件或网络钓鱼活动中被滥用。因此，如果没有额外的身份验证机制来保护给定的域，攻击者就可以滥用该域。为了实现正确的身份验证，过去几年中开发了各种SMTP扩展。在本文中，我们在一项大规模的纵向测量研究中分析了发起DNS域电子邮件认证的三种最常见的方法。在其他发现中，我们确认发件人策略框架(SPF)仍然是实践中最广泛使用的电子邮件身份验证方法。一般来说，我们发现排名较高的域使用更多的身份验证机制，但有时会出现配置错误，例如，我们发现amazon.co.jp有一个无效的SPF记录。趋势分析显示，使用SPF的域名数量(具有统计显著性)不断增长。此外，我们还表明，基于域的消息身份验证、报告和一致性(DMARC)分布也有了显著的发展，在过去五年中增长了十倍。然而，它仍远非完美，总采用率约为11%。美国和英国的政府域名是一个例外，由于具有约束力的法律指令，这两个国家的政府域名采用率都很高。最后，我们详细研究了域名密钥识别邮件(DKIM)的采用情况，发现实际中DKIM使用率的下限接近13%。此外，我们揭示了各种缺陷，如弱密钥或共享的重复密钥。作为一个整体，我们发现大约3%的域结合使用所有三种机制。
papers.title_zh: 基于DNS的电子邮件认证的发展:衡量采用情况和发现缺陷

papers.title: Where We Stand (or Fall): An Analysis of CSRF Defenses in Web Frameworks
papers.authors: Xhelal Likaj, Soheil Khodayari, Giancarlo Pellegrino
papers.abstract: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) is among the oldest web vulnerabilities that, despite its popularity and severity, it is still an understudied security problem. In this paper, we undertake one of the first security evaluations of CSRF defense as implemented by popular web frameworks, with the overarching goal to identify additional explanations to the occurrences of such an old vulnerability. Starting from a review of existing literature, we identify 16 CSRF defenses and 18 potential threats agains them. Then, we evaluate the source code of the 44 most popular web frameworks across five languages (i.e., JavaScript, Python, Java, PHP, and C#) covering about 5.5 million LoCs, intending to determine the implemented defenses and their exposure to the identified threats. We also quantify the quality of web frameworks’ documentation, looking for incomplete, misleading, or insufficient information required by developers to use the implemented CSRF defenses correctly. Our study uncovers a rather complex landscape, suggesting that while implementations of CSRF defenses exist, their correct and secure use depends on developers’ awareness and expertise about CSRF attacks. More than a third of the frameworks require developers to write code to use the defense, modify the configuration to enable CSRF defenses, or look for an external library as CSRF defenses are not built-in. Even when using defenses, developers need to be aware and address a diversity of additional security risks. In total, we identified 157 security risks in 37 frameworks, of which 17 are directly exploitable to mount a CSRF attack, leveraging implementation mistakes, cryptography-related flaws, cookie integrity, and leakage of CSRF tokens—including three critical vulnerabilities in CakePHP, Vert.x-Web, and Play. The developers’ feedback indicate that, for a significant fraction of risks, frameworks have divergent expectations about who is responsible for addressing them. Finally, the documentation analysis reveals several inadequacies, including not mentioning the implemented defense, and not showing code examples for correct use.
papers.abstract_zh: 跨站点请求伪造(CSRF)是最古老的web漏洞之一，尽管它很流行而且很严重，但它仍然是一个研究不足的安全问题。在本文中，我们对由流行的web框架实施的CSRF防御系统进行了第一次安全评估，其总体目标是确定出现这种旧漏洞的其他原因。从对现有文献的回顾开始，我们确定了16种CSRF防御和18种对它们的潜在威胁。然后，我们评估了跨越五种语言(即JavaScript、Python、Java、PHP和C#)的44个最流行的web框架的源代码，涵盖了大约550万个本地代码，旨在确定已实施的防御措施及其对已识别威胁的暴露程度。我们还量化web框架文档的质量，寻找开发人员正确使用已实现的CSRF防御所需的不完整、误导或不充分的信息。我们的研究揭示了一个相当复杂的情况，表明虽然CSRF防御的实现是存在的，但它们的正确和安全使用取决于开发人员对CSRF攻击的认识和专业知识。超过三分之一的框架要求开发人员编写代码来使用防御，修改配置以启用CSRF防御，或者寻找外部库，因为CSRF防御不是内置的。即使在使用防御措施时，开发人员也需要意识到并解决各种额外的安全风险。总的来说，我们在37个框架中发现了157个安全风险，其中17个可直接利用来发起CSRF攻击，利用实现错误、加密相关的缺陷、cookie完整性和CSRF令牌的泄漏，包括CakePHP、Vert.x-Web和Play中的三个关键漏洞。开发人员的反馈表明，对于很大一部分风险，框架对于谁负责解决它们有不同的期望。最后，文档分析揭示了几个不足之处，包括没有提到实现的防御，没有显示正确使用的代码示例。
papers.title_zh: 我们站在哪里(或倒下):Web框架中的CSRF防御分析

papers.title: On the Usability (In)Security of In-App Browsing Interfaces in Mobile Apps
papers.authors: Zicheng Zhang
papers.abstract: Due to the frequent encountering of web URLs in various application scenarios (e.g., chatting and email reading), many mobile apps build their in-app browsing interfaces (IABIs) to provide a seamless user experience. Although this achieves user-friendliness by avoiding the constant switching between the subject app and the system built-in browser apps, we find that IABIs, if not well designed or customized, could result in usability security risks. In this paper, we conduct the first empirical study on the usability (in)security of in-app browsing interfaces in both Android and iOS apps. Specifically, we collect a dataset of 25 high-profile mobile apps from five common application categories that contain IABIs, including Facebook and Gmail, and perform a systematic analysis (not end-user study though) that comprises eight carefully designed security tests and covers the entire course of opening, displaying, and navigating an in-app web page. During this process, we obtain three major security findings: (1) about 30% of the tested apps fail to provide enough URL information for users to make informed decisions on opening an URL; (2) nearly all custom IABIs have various problems in providing sufficient indicators to faithfully display an in-app page to users, whereas ten IABIs that are based on Chrome Custom Tabs and SFSafariViewController are generally secure; and (3) only a few IABIs give warnings to remind users of the risk of inputting passwords during navigating a (potentially phishing) login page. Most developers had acknowledged our findings but their willingness and readiness to fix usability issues are rather low compared to fixing technical vulnerabilities, which is a puzzle in usability security research. Nevertheless, to help mitigate risky IABIs and guide future designs, we propose a set of secure IABI design principles.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于在各种应用场景(例如，聊天和电子邮件阅读)中经常遇到web URLs，许多移动应用构建其应用内浏览界面(IABIs)来提供无缝的用户体验。虽然这通过避免主题应用和系统内置浏览器应用之间的不断切换实现了用户友好性，但我们发现，如果设计或定制不好，IABIs可能会导致可用性安全风险。在本文中，我们对Android和iOS应用中的应用内浏览界面的可用性(In)安全性进行了首次实证研究。具体来说，我们从包含IABIs的五个常见应用类别(包括脸书和Gmail)中收集了25个高知名度移动应用的数据集，并进行系统分析(但不是最终用户研究)，其中包括八项精心设计的安全测试，涵盖了打开、显示和导航应用内网页的整个过程。在这个过程中，我们获得了三个主要的安全发现:(1)大约30%的测试应用程序未能提供足够的URL信息，让用户在打开URL时做出明智的决定；(2)几乎所有的定制iabi在提供足够的指示器以忠实地向用户显示应用内页面方面都存在各种问题，而基于Chrome定制标签和SFSafariViewController的十个iabi一般都是安全的；以及(3)只有少数IABIs给出警告，以提醒用户在导航(潜在的网络钓鱼)登录页面期间输入密码的风险。大多数开发者承认我们的发现，但是与修复技术漏洞相比，他们修复可用性问题的意愿和准备程度相当低，这是可用性安全研究中的一个难题。尽管如此，为了帮助减轻风险和指导未来的设计，我们提出了一套安全的IABI设计原则。
papers.title_zh: 移动应用中应用内浏览界面的可用性安全性

papers.title: Stratosphere: Finding Vulnerable Cloud Storage Buckets
papers.authors: Jack Cable, Drew Mylander Gregory, Liz Izhikevich, Zakir Durumeric
papers.abstract: Misconfigured cloud storage buckets have leaked hundreds of millions of medical, voter, and customer records. These breaches are due to a combination of easily-guessable bucket names and error-prone security configurations, which, together, allow attackers to easily guess and access sensitive data. In this work, we investigate the security of buckets, finding that prior studies have largely underestimated cloud insecurity by focusing on simple, easy-to-guess names. By leveraging prior work in the password analysis space, we introduce Stratosphere, a system that learns how buckets are named in practice in order to efficiently guess the names of vulnerable buckets. Using Stratosphere, we find wide-spread exploitation of buckets and vulnerable configurations continuing to increase over the years. We conclude with recommendations for operators, researchers, and cloud providers.
papers.abstract_zh: 错误配置的云存储桶已经泄露了数亿份医疗、选民和客户记录。这些漏洞是由容易猜测的存储桶名称和容易出错的安全配置共同造成的，这使得攻击者能够轻易猜测和访问敏感数据。在这项工作中，我们调查了桶的安全性，发现以前的研究通过关注简单、容易猜测的名称，在很大程度上低估了云的不安全性。通过利用先前在密码分析领域的工作，我们引入了平流层，这是一个在实践中学习如何命名存储桶的系统，以便有效地猜测易受攻击的存储桶的名称。使用同温层，我们发现桶的广泛利用和易受攻击的配置在过去几年持续增加。最后，我们向运营商、研究人员和云提供商提出了建议。
papers.title_zh: 平流层:寻找易受攻击的云存储桶

papers.title: The Curse of Correlations for Robust Fingerprinting of Relational Databases
papers.authors: Tianxi Ji, Emre Yilmaz, Erman Ayday, Pan Li
papers.abstract: Database fingerprinting have been widely adopted to prevent unauthorized sharing of data and identify the source of data leakages. Although existing schemes are robust against common attacks, like random bit flipping and subset attack, their robustness degrades significantly if attackers utilize the inherent correlations among database entries. In this paper, we first demonstrate the vulnerability of existing database fingerprinting schemes by identifying different correlation attacks: column-wise correlation attack, row-wise correlation attack, and the integration of them. To provide robust fingerprinting against the identified correlation attacks, we then develop mitigation techniques, which can work as post-processing steps for any off-the-shelf database fingerprinting schemes. The proposed mitigation techniques also preserve the utility of the fingerprinted database considering different utility metrics. We empirically investigate the impact of the identified correlation attacks and the performance of mitigation techniques using real-world relational databases. Our results show (i) high success rates of the identified correlation attacks against existing fingerprinting schemes (e.g., the integrated correlation attack can distort 64.8% fingerprint bits by just modifying 14.2% entries in a fingerprinted database), and (ii) high robustness of the proposed mitigation techniques (e.g., with the mitigation techniques, the integrated correlation attack can only distort 3% fingerprint bits).
papers.abstract_zh: 数据库指纹已被广泛采用，以防止未经授权的数据共享和识别数据泄漏的来源。虽然现有的方案对常见的攻击，如随机比特翻转和子集攻击是鲁棒的，但是如果攻击者利用数据库条目之间的内在相关性，它们的鲁棒性会显著下降。在本文中，我们首先通过识别不同的相关攻击来证明现有数据库指纹方案的脆弱性:列相关攻击、行相关攻击以及它们的结合。为了针对已识别的相关性攻击提供稳健的指纹识别，我们随后开发了缓解技术，这些技术可以作为任何现成的数据库指纹识别方案的后处理步骤。考虑到不同的效用度量，所提出的缓解技术还保留了指纹数据库的效用。我们使用现实世界中的关系数据库对已识别的相关性攻击的影响和缓解技术的性能进行了实证研究。我们的结果示出了(I)针对现有指纹方案的所识别的相关攻击的高成功率(例如，集成相关攻击仅通过修改指纹数据库中14.2%的条目就可以扭曲64.8%的指纹比特)，以及(ii)所提出的减轻技术的高鲁棒性(例如，利用减轻技术，集成相关攻击只能扭曲3%的指纹比特)。
papers.title_zh: 关系数据库健壮指纹的相关性诅咒

papers.title: Mini-Me, You Complete Me! Data-Driven Drone Security via DNN-based Approximate Computing
papers.authors: Aolin Ding, Praveen Murthy, Luis Garcia, Pengfei Sun, Matthew Chan, Saman A. Zonouz
papers.abstract: The safe operation of robotic aerial vehicles (RAV) requires effective security protection of their controllers against cyber-physical attacks. The frequency and sophistication of past attacks against such embedded platforms highlight the need for better defense mechanisms. Existing estimation-based control monitors have tradeoffs, with lightweight linear state estimators lacking sufficient coverage, and heavier data-driven learned models facing implementation and accuracy issues on a constrained real-time RAV. We present Mini-Me, a data-driven online monitoring framework that models the program-level control state dynamics to detect runtime data-oriented attacks against RAVs. Mini-Me leverages the internal dataflow information and control variable dependencies of RAV controller functions to train a neural network-based approximate model as the lightweight replica of the original controller programs. Mini-Me runs the minimal approximate model and detects malicious control state deviation by comparing the estimated outputs with those outputs calculated by the original controller program. We demonstrate Mini-Me on a widely adopted RAV physical model as well as popular RAV virtual models based on open-source firmware, ArduPilot and PX4, and show its effectiveness in detecting five types of attack cases with an average 0.34% space overhead and 2.6% runtime overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器人飞行器的安全运行需要对其控制器进行有效的安全保护，以抵御网络物理攻击。过去针对这种嵌入式平台的攻击的频率和复杂性突出了对更好的防御机制的需求。现有的基于估计的控制监视器具有折衷，轻量级线性状态估计器缺乏足够的覆盖范围，而较重的数据驱动学习模型面临在受约束的实时RAV上的实现和准确性问题。我们提出了Mini-Me，一个数据驱动的在线监控框架，它模拟程序级控制状态动态，以检测针对rav的运行时数据攻击。Mini-Me利用内部数据流信息和RAV控制器函数的控制变量依赖性来训练基于神经网络的近似模型，作为原始控制器程序的轻量级副本。Mini-Me运行最小近似模型，并通过将估计输出与由原始控制器程序计算的输出进行比较来检测恶意控制状态偏差。我们在广泛采用的RAV物理模型以及基于开源固件、ArduPilot和PX4的流行RAV虚拟模型上展示了Mini-Me，并展示了它在检测五种攻击情况时的有效性，平均空间开销为0.34%，运行时开销为2.6%。
papers.title_zh: 迷你米，你让我完整！通过基于DNN的近似计算实现数据驱动的无人机安全

papers.title: Living-Off-The-Land Command Detection Using Active Learning
papers.authors: Talha Ongun, Jack W. Stokes, Jonathan Bar Or, Ke Tian, Farid Tajaddodianfar, Joshua Neil, Christian Seifert, Alina Oprea, John C. Platt
papers.abstract: In recent years, enterprises have been targeted by advanced adversaries who leverage creative ways to infiltrate their systems and move laterally to gain access to critical data. One increasingly common evasive method is to hide the malicious activity behind a benign program by using tools that are already installed on user computers. These programs are usually part of the operating system distribution or another user-installed binary, therefore this type of attack is called “Living-Off-The-Land”. Detecting these attacks is challenging, as adversaries may not create malicious files on the victim computers and anti-virus scans fail to detect them. We propose the design of an Active Learning framework called LOLAL for detecting Living-Off-the-Land attacks that iteratively selects a set of uncertain and anomalous samples for labeling by a human analyst. LOLAL is specifically designed to work well when a limited number of labeled samples are available for training machine learning models to detect attacks. We investigate methods to represent command-line text using word-embedding techniques, and design ensemble boosting classifiers to distinguish malicious and benign samples based on the embedding representation. We leverage a large, anonymized dataset collected by an endpoint security product and demonstrate that our ensemble classifiers achieve an average F1 score of 96% at classifying different attack classes. We show that our active learning method consistently improves the classifier performance, as more training data is labeled, and converges in less than 30 iterations when starting with a small number of labeled instances.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，企业已经成为高级对手的目标，这些对手利用创造性的方法渗透他们的系统，并横向移动以获取对关键数据的访问。一种越来越常见的规避方法是通过使用已经安装在用户计算机上的工具将恶意活动隐藏在良性程序后面。这些程序通常是操作系统发行版或其他用户安装的二进制文件的一部分，因此这种类型的攻击被称为“远离陆地的生活”。检测这些攻击具有挑战性，因为对手可能不会在受害计算机上创建恶意文件，并且反病毒扫描无法检测到它们。我们提出了一种称为LOLAL的主动学习框架的设计，用于检测生活在陆地以外的攻击，该框架迭代地选择一组不确定和异常的样本，由人类分析师进行标记。LOLAL是专门设计来在有限数量的标记样本可用于训练机器学习模型来检测攻击时工作良好的。我们研究了使用单词嵌入技术来表示命令行文本的方法，并设计了集成提升分类器来基于嵌入表示来区分恶意和良性样本。我们利用由终端安全产品收集的大型匿名数据集，并证明我们的集成分类器在分类不同攻击类别时达到了96%的平均F1分数。我们表明，随着更多的训练数据被标记，我们的主动学习方法不断提高分类器的性能，并且当从少量的标记实例开始时，在不到30次迭代中收敛。
papers.title_zh: 使用主动学习的离地生活命令检测

papers.title: SyML: Guiding Symbolic Execution Toward Vulnerable States Through Pattern Learning
papers.authors: Nicola Ruaro, Kyle Zeng, Lukas Dresel, Mario Polino, Tiffany Bao, Andrea Continella, Stefano Zanero, Christopher Kruegel, Giovanni Vigna
papers.abstract: Exploring many execution paths in a binary program is essential to discover new vulnerabilities. Dynamic Symbolic Execution (DSE) is useful to trigger complex input conditions and enables an accurate exploration of a program while providing extensive crash replayability and semantic insights. However, scaling this type of analysis to complex binaries is difficult. Current methods suffer from the path explosion problem, despite many attempts to mitigate this challenge (e.g., by merging paths when appropriate). Still, in general, this challenge is not yet surmounted, and most bugs discovered through such techniques are shallow. We propose a novel approach to address the path explosion problem: A smart triaging system that leverages supervised machine learning techniques to replicate human expertise, leading to vulnerable path discovery. Our approach monitors the execution traces in vulnerable programs and extracts relevant features—register and memory accesses, function complexity, system calls—to guide the symbolic exploration. We train models to learn the patterns of vulnerable paths from the extracted features, and we leverage their predictions to discover interesting execution paths in new programs. We implement our approach in a tool called SyML, and we evaluate it on the Cyber Grand Challenge (CGC) dataset—a well-known dataset of vulnerable programs—and on 3 real-world Linux binaries. We show that the knowledge collected from the analysis of vulnerable paths, without any explicit prior knowledge about vulnerability patterns, is transferrable to unseen binaries, and leads to outperforming prior work in path prioritization by triggering more, and different, unique vulnerabilities.
papers.abstract_zh: 探索二进制程序中的许多执行路径对于发现新的漏洞至关重要。动态符号执行(DSE)有助于触发复杂的输入条件，并在提供广泛的崩溃可再现性和语义洞察力的同时，实现对程序的准确探索。然而，将这种类型的分析扩展到复杂的二进制文件是困难的。当前的方法受到路径爆炸问题的困扰，尽管进行了许多尝试来减轻这一挑战(例如，通过在适当的时候合并路径)。不过，总的来说，这个挑战还没有被克服，通过这种技术发现的大多数bug都很肤浅。我们提出了一种解决路径爆炸问题的新方法:一种智能分类系统，它利用有监督的机器学习技术来复制人类的专业知识，从而发现脆弱的路径。我们的方法监控易受攻击程序中的执行轨迹，并提取相关特征(寄存器和内存访问、函数复杂性、系统调用)来指导符号探索。我们训练模型从提取的特征中学习易受攻击路径的模式，并利用它们的预测来发现新程序中有趣的执行路径。我们在一个名为SyML的工具中实现了我们的方法，并在赛博大挑战(CGC)数据集(一个众所周知的易受攻击程序数据集)和3个真实世界的Linux二进制文件上进行评估。我们表明，从易受攻击路径的分析中收集的知识，在没有任何关于易受攻击模式的明确先验知识的情况下，可以转移到看不见的二进制文件，并且通过触发更多不同的独特的易受攻击性，导致在路径优先化方面优于先前的工作。
papers.title_zh: SyML:通过模式学习引导易受攻击状态的符号执行

papers.title: SpecROP: Speculative Exploitation of ROP Chains
papers.authors: Atri Bhattacharyya, Andrés Sánchez, Esmaeil Mohammadian Koruyeh, Nael B. Abu-Ghazaleh, Chengyu Song, Mathias Payer
papers.abstract: Speculative execution attacks, such as Spectre, reuse code from the victim’s binary to access and leak secret information during speculative execution. Every variant of the attack requires very particular code sequences, necessitating elaborate gadget-search campaigns. Often, victim programs contain few, or even zero, usable gadgets. Consequently, speculative attacks are sometimes demonstrated by injecting usable code sequences into the victim. So far, attacks search for monolithic gadgets, a single sequence of code which performs all the attack steps. We introduce SpecROP, a novel speculative execution attack technique, inspired by classic code reuse attacks like Return-Oriented Programming to tackle the rarity of code gadgets. The SpecROP attacker uses multiple, small gadgets chained by poisoning multiple control-flow instructions to perform the same computation as a monolithic gadget. A key difference to classic code reuse attacks is that control-flow transfers between gadgets use speculative targets compared to targets in memory or registers. We categorize SpecROP gadgets into generic classes and demonstrate the abundance of such gadgets in victim libraries. Further, we explore the practicality of influencing multiple control-flow instructions on modern processors, and demonstrate an attack which uses gadget chaining to increase the leakage potential of a Spectre variant, SMoTherSpectre.
papers.abstract_zh: 推测性执行攻击，如Spectre，在推测性执行期间重用受害者二进制文件中的代码来访问和泄漏秘密信息。攻击的每一个变种都需要非常特殊的代码序列，这就需要精心设计的小工具搜索活动。通常，受害程序包含很少甚至零个可用的小工具。因此，推测性攻击有时是通过向受害者注入可用的代码序列来实现的。到目前为止，攻击搜索的是单块小工具，即执行所有攻击步骤的单一代码序列。我们介绍了SpecROP，一种新颖的推测性执行攻击技术，它受经典代码重用攻击(如面向返回的编程)的启发，以解决代码小工具的稀有性。SpecROP攻击者使用通过毒化多个控制流指令而链接起来的多个小工具来执行与单个小工具相同的计算。与传统的代码重用攻击的一个关键区别是，与内存或寄存器中的目标相比，小工具之间的控制流传输使用推测性目标。我们将SpecROP小工具分类到通用类中，并展示了受害者库中丰富的此类小工具。此外，我们探索了在现代处理器上影响多个控制流指令的实用性，并演示了一种攻击，该攻击使用小工具链接来增加Spectre变体SMoTherSpectre的泄漏可能性。
papers.title_zh: spec ROP:ROP链的投机性利用

papers.title: Never Trust Your Victim: Weaponizing Vulnerabilities in Security Scanners
papers.authors: Andrea Valenza, Gabriele Costa, Alessandro Armando
papers.abstract: The first step of every attack is reconnaissance, i.e., to acquire information about the target. A common belief is that there is almost no risk in scanning a target from a remote location. In this paper we falsify this belief by showing that scanners are exposed to the same risks as their targets. Our methodology is based on a novel attacker model where the scan author becomes the victim of a counter-strike. We developed a working prototype, called RevOK, and we applied it to 78 scanning systems. Out of them, 36 were found vulnerable to XSS. Remarkably, RevOK also found a severe vulnerability in Metasploit Pro, a mainstream penetration testing tool.
papers.abstract_zh: 每一次攻击的第一步都是侦察，即获取有关目标的信息。一个普遍的看法是，从远程位置扫描目标几乎没有风险。在本文中，我们通过证明扫描仪暴露于与目标相同的风险中来证伪这一信念。我们的方法是基于一个新颖的攻击者模型，其中扫描作者成为反恐精英的受害者。我们开发了一个工作原型，叫做RevOK，我们将其应用于78个扫描系统。其中，36个国家被发现易受XSS病毒感染。值得注意的是，RevOK还在主流渗透测试工具Metasploit Pro中发现了一个严重的漏洞。
papers.title_zh: 永远不要相信你的受害者:将安全扫描仪中的漏洞武器化

papers.title: Camera Fingerprinting Authentication Revisited
papers.authors: Dominik Christian Maier, Henrik Erb, Patrick Mullan, Vincent Haupert
papers.title_zh: 摄像头指纹认证再探

papers.title: Binary-level Directed Fuzzing for Use-After-Free Vulnerabilities
papers.authors: Manh-Dung Nguyen, Sébastien Bardin, Richard Bonichon, Roland Groz, Matthieu Lemerre
papers.abstract: Directed fuzzing focuses on automatically testing specific parts of the code by taking advantage of additional information such as (partial) bug stack trace, patches or risky operations. Key applications include bug reproduction, patch testing and static analysis report verification. Although directed fuzzing has received a lot of attention recently, hard-to-detect vulnerabilities such as Use-After-Free (UAF) are still not well addressed, especially at the binary level. We propose UAFuzz, the first (binary-level) directed greybox fuzzer dedicated to UAF bugs. The technique features a fuzzing engine tailored to UAF specifics, a lightweight code instrumentation and an efficient bug triage step. Experimental evaluation for bug reproduction on real cases demonstrates that UAFuzz significantly outperforms state-of-the-art directed fuzzers in terms of fault detection rate, time to exposure and bug triaging. UAFuzz has also been proven effective in patch testing, leading to the discovery of 30 new bugs (7 CVEs) in programs such as Perl, GPAC and GNU Patch. Finally, we provide to the community a large fuzzing benchmark dedicated to UAF, built on both real codes and real bugs.
papers.abstract_zh: 定向模糊化通过利用额外的信息，例如(部分)错误堆栈跟踪、补丁或有风险的操作，专注于自动测试代码的特定部分。关键应用包括bug重现、补丁测试和静态分析报告验证。尽管定向模糊最近受到了很多关注，但难以检测的漏洞，如释放后使用(UAF)仍然没有得到很好的解决，特别是在二进制级别。我们提出了UAFuzz，第一个(二进制级)致力于UAF错误的定向灰箱fuzzer。该技术的特点是一个根据UAF具体情况定制的模糊引擎，一个轻量级代码工具和一个有效的错误分类步骤。在真实案例上对bug重现的实验评估表明，在故障检测率、暴露时间和bug分类方面，UAFuzz明显优于最先进的定向fuzzers。UAFuzz在补丁测试中也被证明是有效的，导致在Perl、GPAC和GNU Patch等程序中发现了30个新的bugs个CVE)。最后，我们向社区提供了一个专用于UAF的大型fuzzing基准测试，它建立在真实代码和真实错误的基础上。
papers.title_zh: 针对免后使用漏洞的二进制定向模糊化

papers.title: WearFlow: Expanding Information Flow Analysis To Companion Apps in Wear OS
papers.authors: Marcos Tileria, Jorge Blasco, Guillermo Suarez-Tangil
papers.abstract: Smartwatches and wearable technology have proliferated in the recent years featured by a seamless integration with a paired smartphone. Many mobile applications now come with a companion app that the mobile OS deploys on the wearable. These execution environments expand the context of mobile applications across more than one device, introducing new security and privacy issues. One such issue is that current information ﬂow analysis techniques can not capture communication between devices. This can lead to undetected privacy leaks when developers use these channels. In this paper, we present WearFlow, a framework that uses static analysis to detect sensitive data ﬂows across mobile and wearable companion apps in Android. WearFlow augments taint analysis capabilities to enable inter-device analysis of apps. WearFlow models proprietary libraries embedded in Google Play Services and instruments the mobile and wearable app to allow for a precise information ﬂow analysis between them. We evaluate WearFlow on a test suite purposely designed to cover different scenarios for the communication Mobile-Wear, which we release as Wear-Bench . We also run WearFlow on 3K+ real-world apps and discover privacy violations in popular apps (10M+ downloads).
papers.abstract_zh: 智能手表和可穿戴技术近年来激增，其特点是与配对的智能手机无缝集成。许多移动应用程序现在都附带了一个配套应用程序，移动操作系统将其部署在可穿戴设备上。这些执行环境将移动应用程序的上下文扩展到多个设备，带来了新的安全和隐私问题。其中一个问题是，当前的信息流分析技术无法捕捉设备之间的通信。当开发人员使用这些渠道时，这可能会导致未被发现的隐私泄露。在本文中，我们介绍了WearFlow，这是一个使用静态分析来检测Android中移动和可穿戴配套应用之间的敏感数据流的框架。WearFlow增强了污点分析能力，支持应用程序的设备间分析。WearFlow对嵌入在Google Play服务中的专有库进行建模，并为移动和可穿戴应用提供工具，以实现它们之间的精确信息流分析。我们在一个测试套件上对WearFlow进行了评估，该测试套件旨在覆盖通信移动穿戴的不同场景，我们将其发布为Wear-Bench。我们还在3K+现实世界的应用程序上运行WearFlow，并在热门应用程序中发现侵犯隐私的行为(下载量超过1000万)。
papers.title_zh: WearFlow:将信息流分析扩展到Wear OS中的配套应用

papers.title: MEUZZ: Smart Seed Scheduling for Hybrid Fuzzing
papers.authors: Yaohui Chen, Mansour Ahmadi, Reza Mirzazade Farkhani, Boyu Wang, Long Lu
papers.abstract: Seed scheduling is a prominent factor in determining the yields of hybrid fuzzing. Existing hybrid fuzzers schedule seeds based on fixed heuristics that aim to predict input utilities. However, such heuristics are not generalizable as there exists no one-size-fits-all rule applicable to different programs. They may work well on the programs from which they were derived, but not others. To overcome this problem, we design a Machine learning-Enhanced hybrid fUZZing system (MEUZZ), which employs supervised machine learning for adaptive and generalizable seed scheduling. MEUZZ determines which new seeds are expected to produce better fuzzing yields based on the knowledge learned from past seed scheduling decisions made on the same or similar programs. MEUZZ's learning is based on a series of features extracted via code reachability and dynamic analysis, which incurs negligible runtime overhead (in microseconds). Moreover, MEUZZ automatically infers the data labels by evaluating the fuzzing performance of each selected seed. As a result, MEUZZ is generally applicable to, and performs well on, various kinds of programs. Our evaluation shows MEUZZ significantly outperforms the state-of-the-art grey-box and hybrid fuzzers, achieving 27.1% more code coverage than QSYM. The learned models are reusable and transferable, which boosts fuzzing performance by 7.1% on average and improves 68% of the 56 cross-program fuzzing campaigns. MEUZZ discovered 47 deeply hidden and previously unknown bugs--with 21 confirmed and fixed by the developers--when fuzzing 8 well-tested programs with the same configurations as used in previous work.
papers.abstract_zh: 种子调度是决定杂交制种产量的一个重要因素。现有的混合模糊器基于旨在预测输入效用的固定试探法来调度种子。然而，这种试探法是不可推广的，因为不存在适用于不同程序的通用规则。它们可能在衍生它们的程序上运行良好，但在其他程序上则不然。为了克服这个问题，我们设计了一个机器学习增强的混合模糊系统(MEUZZ ),该系统采用有监督的机器学习来进行自适应和可推广的种子调度。MEUZZ根据从过去在相同或类似项目上做出的种子调度决策中获得的知识，确定哪些新种子预计会产生更好的产量。MEUZZ的学习是基于通过代码可达性和动态分析提取的一系列特征，这导致了可以忽略的运行时开销(以微秒计)。此外，MEUZZ通过评估每个选定种子的模糊性能来自动推断数据标签。因此，MEUZZ通常适用于各种类型的程序，并在其上表现良好。我们的评估显示，MEUZZ明显优于最先进的灰盒和混合模糊器，代码覆盖率比QSYM高27.1%。学习的模型可重复使用和转移，这将模糊性能平均提高了7.1%，并提高了56次跨程序模糊活动的68%。MEUZZ发现了47个隐藏很深的未知错误——其中21个已经被开发人员确认并修复了——这是在对8个测试良好的程序进行模糊处理时发现的，这些程序与之前的工作中使用的配置相同。
papers.title_zh: MEUZZ:混合模糊的智能种子调度

papers.title: Tracing and Analyzing Web Access Paths Based on User-Side Data Collection: How Do Users Reach Malicious URLs?
papers.authors: Takeshi Takahashi, Christopher Kruegel, Giovanni Vigna, Katsunari Yoshioka, Daisuke Inoue
papers.abstract: Web access exposes users to various attacks, such as malware infections and social engineering attacks. Despite ongoing efforts by security and browser vendors to protect users, some users continue to access malicious URLs. To provide better protection, we need to know how users reach such URLs. In this work, we collect web access records of users from their using our browser extension. Differing from data collection on the network, user-side data collection enables us to discern users and web browser tabs, facilitating efﬁcient data analysis. Then, we propose a scheme to extract an entire web access path to a malicious URL, called a hazardous path, from the access records. With all the hazardous paths extracted from the access records, we analyze web access activities of users considering initial accesses on the hazardous paths, risk levels of bookmarked URLs, time required to reach malicious URLs, and the number of concurrently active browser tabs when reaching such URLs. In addition, we propose a preemptive domain ﬁltering scheme, which identiﬁes domains leading to malicious URLs, called hazardous domains. We demonstrate the effectiveness of the scheme by identifying hazardous domains that are not included in blacklists.
papers.abstract_zh: Web访问使用户面临各种攻击，如恶意软件感染和社会工程攻击。尽管安全和浏览器供应商一直在努力保护用户，但一些用户仍继续访问恶意URL。为了提供更好的保护，我们需要知道用户是如何到达这些网址的。在这项工作中，我们从使用我们的浏览器扩展的用户那里收集web访问记录。与网络上的数据收集不同，用户端数据收集使我们能够辨别用户和网络浏览器标签，从而促进有效的数据分析。然后，我们提出一个方案，从访问记录中提取到恶意URL的整个web访问路径，称为危险路径。利用从访问记录中提取的所有危险路径，我们分析用户的web访问活动，考虑危险路径上的初始访问、书签标记的URL的风险级别、到达恶意URL所需的时间以及到达此类URL时并发活动的浏览器标签的数量。此外，我们提出了一个先发制人的域过滤方案，该方案可以识别导致恶意URL的域，称为危险域。我们通过识别不包括在黑名单中的危险域来证明该方案的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 基于用户端数据收集的Web访问路径追踪与分析:用户如何到达恶意URL？

papers.title: What's in an Exploit? An Empirical Analysis of Reflected Server XSS Exploitation Techniques
papers.authors: Ahmet Salih Buyukkayhan, Can Gemicioglu, Tobias Lauinger, Alina Oprea, William Robertson, Engin Kirda
papers.abstract: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) is one of the most prevalent vulnerabilities on the Web. While exploitation techniques are publicly documented, to date there is no study of how frequently each technique is used in the wild. In this paper, we conduct a longitudinal study of 134 k reflected server XSS exploits submitted to XSSED and OPENBUGBOUNTY, two vulnerability databases collectively spanning a time period of nearly ten years.
