We use a combination of static and dynamic analysis techniques to identify the portion of each archived server response that contains the exploit, execute it in a sandboxed analysis environment, and detect the exploitation techniques used. We categorize the exploits based on the exploitation techniques used and generate common exploit patterns. We find that most exploits are relatively simple, but there is a moderate trend of increased sophistication over time. For example, as automated XSS defenses evolve, direct code execution with <script> is declining in favour of indirect execution triggered by event handlers in conjunction with other tags, such as <svg onload. We release our annotated data, enabling researchers to create diverse exploit samples for model training or system evaluation.
papers.abstract_zh: 跨站脚本(XSS)是网络上最普遍的漏洞之一。虽然开发技术被公开记录，但迄今为止还没有研究每种技术在野外使用的频率。在本文中，我们对提交给XSSED和OPENBUGBOUNTY这两个漏洞数据库的134 k反射服务器XSS漏洞进行了纵向研究，这两个数据库共同跨越了近十年的时间周期。我们结合使用静态和动态分析技术来识别每个存档服务器响应中包含漏洞的部分，在沙盒分析环境中执行，并检测所使用的漏洞利用技术。我们根据使用的利用技术对利用进行分类，并生成常见的利用模式。我们发现大多数攻击都相对简单，但随着时间的推移，也有适度增加复杂性的趋势。例如，随着自动化XSS防御的发展，使用< script >的直接代码执行正在减少，而倾向于由事件处理程序结合其他标记(如< svg onload)触发的间接执行。我们发布我们的注释数据，使研究人员能够为模型训练或系统评估创建不同的利用样本。
papers.title_zh: 漏洞有什么？反射式服务器XSS利用技术的实证分析

papers.title: Mininode: Reducing the Attack Surface of Node.js Applications
papers.authors: Igibek Koishybayev, Alexandros Kapravelos
papers.abstract: JavaScript has gained traction as a programming language that qualifies for both the client-side and the server-side logic of applications. A new ecosystem of server-side code written in JavaScript has been enabled by Node.js, the use of the V8 JavaScript engine and a collection of modules that provide various core functionality. Node.js comes with its package manager, called NPM, to handle the dependencies of modern applications, which allow developers to build Node.js applications with hundreds of dependencies on other modules. In this paper, we present Mininode, a static analysis tool for Node.js applications that measures and removes unused code and dependencies. Our tool can be integrated into the building pipeline of Node.js applications to produce applications with significantly reduced attack surface. We analyzed 672k Node.js applications and reported the current state of code bloating in the server-side JavaScript ecosystem. We leverage a vulnerability database to identify 1,660 vulnerable packages that are loaded from 119,433 applications as dependencies. Mininode is capable of removing 2,861 of these vulnerable dependencies. The complex expressiveness and the dynamic nature of the JavaScript language does not always allow us to statically resolve the dependencies and usage of modules. To evaluate the correctness of our reduction, we run Mininode against 37k Node.js applications that have unit tests and reduce correctly 95.4% of packages. Mininode was able to restrict access to the built-in fs and net modules in 79.4% and 96.2% of the reduced applications respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: JavaScript作为一种既适合客户端逻辑又适合服务器端逻辑的编程语言获得了广泛的关注。Node.js使用V8 JavaScript引擎和一组提供各种核心功能的模块，实现了用JavaScript编写的服务器端代码的新生态系统。Node.js附带了名为NPM的包管理器，用于处理现代应用程序的依赖关系，这使得开发人员可以构建与其他模块有数百种依赖关系的Node.js应用程序。在本文中，我们介绍了Mininode，这是一个用于Node.js应用程序的静态分析工具，它可以测量并删除未使用的代码和依赖项。我们的工具可以集成到Node.js应用程序的构建管道中，以生成攻击面显著减少的应用程序。我们分析了672k Node.js应用程序，并报告了服务器端JavaScript生态系统中代码膨胀的当前状态。我们利用漏洞数据库来识别从119，433个应用程序加载的1，660个易受攻击的包作为依赖项。Mininode能够移除2861个这些易受攻击的依赖项。JavaScript语言的复杂表达能力和动态特性并不总是允许我们静态地解析模块的依赖和使用。为了评估我们缩减的正确性，我们对37k Node.js应用程序运行Mininode，这些应用程序有单元测试，并正确缩减了95.4%的包。Mininode能够分别在79.4%和96.2%的缩减应用中限制对内置fs和net模块的访问。
papers.title_zh: Mininode:减少Node.js应用程序的攻击面

papers.title: Evaluating Changes to Fake Account Verification Systems
papers.authors: Fedor Kozlov, Isabella Yuen, Jakub Kowalczyk, Daniel Bernhardt, David Freeman, Paul Pearce, Ivan Ivanov
papers.abstract: Online social networks (OSNs) such as Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn give hundreds of millions of individuals around the world the ability to communicate and build communities. However, the extensive user base of OSNs provides considerable opportunity for malicious actors to abuse the system, with fake accounts generating the vast majority of harmful actions and content. Social networks employ sophisticated detection mechanisms based on machine-learning classifiers and graph analysis to identify and remediate the actions of fake accounts. Disabling or deleting these detected accounts is not tractable when the number of false positives (i.e., real users disabled) is significant in absolute terms. Using challenge-based verification systems such as CAPTCHAs or phone confirmation as a response for detected fake accounts can enable erroneously detected real users to recover their access, while also making it difficult for attackers to abuse the platform. In order to maintain a verification system’s effectiveness over time, it is important to iterate on the system to improve the real user experience and adapt the platform’s response to adversarial actions. However, at present there is no established method to evaluate how effective each iteration is at stopping fake accounts and letting real users through. This paper proposes a method of assessing the effectiveness of experimental iterations for OSN verification systems, and presents an evaluation of this method against humanlabelled ground truth data using production Facebook data. Our method reduces the volume of necessary human labelled data by 70%, decreases the time necessary for classification by 81%, has suitable precision/recall for making decisions in response to experiments, and enables continuous monitoring of the effectiveness of the applied experimental changes.
papers.abstract_zh: 脸书、Twitter和LinkedIn等在线社交网络为全球数亿人提供了交流和建立社区的能力。然而，OSNs广泛的用户基础为恶意行为者滥用该系统提供了相当大的机会，虚假账户产生了绝大多数有害行为和内容。社交网络采用基于机器学习分类器和图形分析的复杂检测机制来识别和补救虚假账户的行为。当假阳性(即，真实用户被禁用)的数量在绝对值上很大时，禁用或删除这些检测到的账户是不容易处理的。使用基于挑战的验证系统(如验证码或电话确认)作为对检测到的虚假帐户的响应，可以使被错误检测到的真实用户恢复其访问权限，同时也使攻击者难以滥用平台。为了随着时间的推移保持验证系统的有效性，重要的是对系统进行迭代，以改善真实的用户体验，并调整平台对敌对行动的响应。然而，目前还没有确定的方法来评估每次迭代在阻止虚假账户和让真实用户通过方面有多有效。本文提出了一种评估OSN验证系统实验迭代有效性的方法，并使用脸书生产数据对该方法进行了评估。我们的方法将必要的人类标记数据量减少了70%,将分类所需的时间减少了81%,对于响应实验做出决策具有合适的精度/召回率，并且使得能够连续监控所应用的实验改变的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 评估假账户验证系统的变化

papers.title: SourceFinder: Finding Malware Source-Code from Publicly Available Repositories in GitHub
papers.authors: Md Omar Faruk Rokon, Risul Islam, Ahmad Darki, Evangelos E. Papalexakis, Michalis Faloutsos
papers.abstract: Where can we find malware source code? This question is motivated by a real need: there is a dearth of malware source code, which impedes various types of security research. Our work is driven by the following insight: public archives, like GitHub, have a surprising number of malware repositories. Capitalizing on this opportunity, we propose, SourceFinder, a supervised-learning approach to identify repositories of malware source code efficiently. We evaluate and apply our approach using 97K repositories from GitHub. First, we show that our approach identifies malware repositories with 89% precision and 86% recall using a labeled dataset. Second, we use SourceFinder to identify 7504 malware source code repositories, which arguably constitutes the largest malware source code database. Finally, we study the fundamental properties and trends of the malware repositories and their authors. The number of such repositories appears to be growing by an order of magnitude every 4 years, and 18 malware authors seem to be "professionals" with well-established online reputation. We argue that our approach and our large repository of malware source code can be a catalyst for research studies, which are currently not possible.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们在哪里可以找到恶意软件的源代码？这个问题是出于一个真实的需要:缺乏恶意软件源代码，这阻碍了各种类型的安全研究。我们的工作受到以下观点的驱动:像GitHub这样的公共档案馆拥有数量惊人的恶意软件库。利用这个机会，我们提出了SourceFinder，一种监督学习的方法来有效地识别恶意软件源代码库。我们使用GitHub的97K存储库来评估和应用我们的方法。首先，我们表明，我们的方法使用标记数据集以89%的精确度和86%的召回率识别恶意软件仓库。第二，我们使用SourceFinder来识别7504个恶意软件源代码库，这可以说构成了最大的恶意软件源代码数据库。最后，我们研究了恶意软件库及其作者的基本属性和趋势。此类存储库的数量似乎每4年增长一个数量级，18个恶意软件作者似乎是拥有良好在线声誉的“专业人士”。我们认为，我们的方法和我们庞大的恶意软件源代码库可以成为研究的催化剂，而这在目前是不可能的。
papers.title_zh: SourceFinder:从GitHub中公开的存储库中查找恶意软件源代码

papers.title: HyperLeech: Stealthy System Virtualization with Minimal Target Impact through DMA-Based Hypervisor Injection
papers.authors: Ralph Palutke, Simon Ruderich, Matthias Wild, Felix C. Freiling
papers.abstract: In the recent past, malware began to incorporate anti-forensic techniques in order to hinder analysts from gaining meaningful results. Consequently, methods that allow the stealthy analysis of a system became increasingly important. In this paper, we present HyperLeech, the first approach which uses DMA to stealthily inject a thin hypervisor into the memory of a target host, transparently shifting its operation into a hardware-accelerated virtual machine. For the code injection, we make use of external PCILeech hardware to enable DMA to the target memory. Combining the advantages of hardware-supported virtualization with the benefits provided by DMA-based code injection, our approach can serve analysts as a stealthy and privileged execution layer that enables powerful live forensics and atomic memory snapshots for already running systems. Our experiments revealed that HyperLeech is sufficient to virtualize multi-core Linux hosts without causing significant impact on a target’s processor and memory state during its installation, execution, and removal. Although our approach might be misused for malicious purposes, we conclude that it provides new knowledge to help researchers with the design of stealthy system introspection techniques that focus on preserving a target system’s state.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，恶意软件开始结合反取证技术，以阻止分析师获得有意义的结果。因此，允许对系统进行秘密分析的方法变得越来越重要。在本文中，我们介绍了HyperLeech，这是第一种使用DMA将瘦虚拟机管理程序悄悄注入目标主机内存的方法，它透明地将其操作转移到硬件加速的虚拟机中。对于代码注入，我们利用外部PCILeech硬件来支持对目标存储器的DMA。将硬件支持的虚拟化的优势与基于DMA的代码注入的优势相结合，我们的方法可以作为一个隐形的特权执行层为分析师服务，为已经运行的系统实现强大的实时取证和原子内存快照。我们的实验表明，HyperLeech足以虚拟化多核Linux主机，而不会在其安装、执行和删除期间对目标的处理器和内存状态造成重大影响。尽管我们的方法可能会被恶意滥用，但我们得出结论，它提供了新的知识来帮助研究人员设计专注于保留目标系统状态的隐形系统自省技术。
papers.title_zh: HyperLeech:通过基于DMA的虚拟机管理程序注入，实现对目标影响最小的隐形系统虚拟化

papers.title: Effective Detection of Credential Thefts from Windows Memory: Learning Access Behaviours to Local Security Authority Subsystem Service
papers.authors: Patrick Ah-Fat, Michael Huth, Rob Mead, Tim Burrell, Joshua Neil
papers.abstract: Malicious actors that have already penetrated an enterprise network will exploit access to launch attacks within that network. Credential theft is a common preparatory action for such attacks, as it enables privilege escalation or lateral movement. Elaborate techniques for extracting credentials from Windows memory have been developed by actors with advanced capabilities. The state of the art in identifying the use of such techniques is based on malware detection, which can only alert on the presence of specific executable files that are known to perform such techniques. Therefore, actors can bypass detection of credential theft by evading the static detection of malicious code. In contrast, our work focuses directly on the memory read access behaviour to the process that enforces the system security policy. We use machine learning techniques driven by data from real enterprise networks to classify memory read behaviours as malicious or benign. As we show that Mimikatz is a popular tool seen across Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection (MDATP) to steal credentials, our aim is to develop a generic model that detects the techniques it employs. Our classifier is based on novel features of memory read events and the characterisation of three popular techniques for credential theft. We integrated this classifier in a detector that is now running in production and is protecting customers of MDATP. Our experiments demonstrate that this detector has excellent false negative and false positive rates, and does alert on true positives that previous detectors were unable to identify.
papers.abstract_zh: 已经渗透到企业网络中的恶意行为者将利用访问权在该网络中发起攻击。凭据盗窃是此类攻击的常见预备行为，因为它支持权限提升或横向移动。具有高级功能的参与者已经开发出了从Windows内存中提取凭据的复杂技术。识别这种技术的使用的现有技术是基于恶意软件检测的，该恶意软件检测只能警告已知执行这种技术的特定可执行文件的存在。因此，参与者可以通过规避恶意代码的静态检测来绕过对凭据窃取的检测。相比之下，我们的工作直接关注执行系统安全策略的进程的内存读取访问行为。我们使用由来自真实企业网络的数据驱动的机器学习技术来将内存读取行为分类为恶意或良性。正如我们所展示的，Mimikatz是Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection(MD ATP)中常见的窃取凭据的工具，我们的目标是开发一个通用模型来检测它所采用的技术。我们的分类器基于内存读取事件的新特征和三种常见凭据窃取技术的特征。我们将这种分类器集成到一个检测器中，该检测器目前正在生产中运行，并保护MDATP的客户。我们的实验表明，这种检测器具有很好的假阴性和假阳性率，并对以前的检测器无法识别的真阳性发出警报。
papers.title_zh: 有效检测Windows内存中的凭据盗窃:学习对本地安全机构子系统服务的访问行为

papers.title: EnclavePDP: A General Framework to Verify Data Integrity in Cloud Using Intel SGX
papers.authors: Yun He, Yihua Xu, Xiaoqi Jia, Shengzhi Zhang, Peng Liu, Shuai Chang
papers.abstract: As the cloud storage service becomes pervasive, verifying the integrity of their outsourced data on cloud remotely turns out to be challenging for users. Existing Provable Data Possession (PDP) schemes mostly resort to a Third Party Auditor (TPA) to verify the integrity on behalf of users, thus reducing their communication and computation burden. However, such schemes demand fully trusted TPA, that is, placing TPA in the Trusted Computing Base (TCB), which is not always a reasonable assumption. In this paper, we propose EnclavePDP, a secure and general data integrity verification framework that relies on Intel SGX to establish the TCB for PDP schemes, thus eliminating the TPA from the TCB. EnclavePDP supports both new and existing PDP schemes by integrating core functionalities of cryptography libraries into Intel SGX. We choose 10 existing representative PDP schemes, and port them into EnclavePDP with reasonable effort. By deploying EnclavePDP in a real-world cloud storage platform and running the 10 PDP schemes respectively, we demonstrate that EnclavePDP can eliminate the dependence on TPA and introduce reasonable performance overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云存储服务的普及，远程验证云上外包数据的完整性对用户来说是一个挑战。现有的可证明数据拥有(PDP)方案大多依靠第三方审计者(TPA)来代表用户验证完整性，从而减少用户的通信和计算负担。然而，这种方案要求完全可信的TPA，即把TPA放在可信计算基(TCB)中，这并不总是一个合理的假设。在本文中，我们提出了EnclavePDP，这是一个安全的通用数据完整性验证框架，它依靠SGX为PDP方案建立TCB，从而从TCB中消除TPA。EnclavePDP通过将加密库的核心功能集成到SGX中，支持新的和现有的PDP方案。我们选择了10个现有的有代表性的PDP方案，并通过合理的努力将它们移植到EnclavePDP中。通过在真实的云存储平台中部署EnclavePDP并分别运行10个PDP方案，我们证明了EnclavePDP可以消除对TPA的依赖并引入合理的性能开销。
papers.title_zh: EnclavePDP:使用SGX验证云中数据完整性的通用框架

papers.title: Robust P2P Primitives Using SGX Enclaves
papers.authors: Yaoqi Jia, Shruti Tople, Tarik Moataz, Deli Gong, Prateek Saxena, Zhenkai Liang
papers.abstract: Peer-to-peer (P2P) systems such as BitTorrent and Bitcoin are susceptible to serious attacks from byzantine nodes that join as peers. Due to well-known impossibility results for designing P2P primitives in unrestricted byzantine settings, research has explored many adversarial models with additional assumptions, ranging from mild (such as pre-established PKI) to strong (such as the existence of common random coins). One such widely-studied model is the general-omission model, which yields simple protocols with good efficiency, but has been considered impractical or unrealizable since it artificially limits the adversary only to omitting messages.In this work, we study the setting of a synchronous network wherein peer nodes have CPUs equipped with a recent trusted computing mechanism called Intel SGX. In this model, we observe that the byzantine adversary reduces to the adversary in the general-omission model. As a first result, we show that by leveraging SGX features, we eliminate any source of advantage for a byzantine adversary beyond that gained by omitting messages, making the general-omission model realizable. Our evaluation of 1000 nodes running on 40 DeterLab machines confirms theoretical efficiency claim.
papers.abstract_zh: 诸如BitTorrent和比特币的对等(P2P)系统容易受到来自作为对等体加入的拜占庭节点的严重攻击。由于在不受限制的拜占庭环境中设计P2P原语的众所周知的不可能性结果，研究已经探索了许多具有附加假设的对抗模型，从温和的(如预先建立的PKI)到强烈的(如常见随机硬币的存在)。一个这样的被广泛研究的模型是一般省略模型，它产生具有良好效率的简单协议，但是已经被认为是不切实际或不可实现的，因为它人为地将对手限制为仅省略消息。在这项工作中，我们研究了同步网络的设置，其中对等节点的CPU配备了一种最新的可信计算机制，称为SGX。在这个模型中，我们观察到拜占庭敌手简化为一般省略模型中的敌手。作为第一个结果，我们表明，通过利用SGX特征，我们消除了拜占庭对手除了通过省略消息获得的优势之外的任何优势来源，使得一般省略模型可实现。我们对运行在40台DeterLab机器上的1000个节点的评估证实了理论上的效率声明。
papers.title_zh: 使用SGX飞地的健壮P2P原语

papers.title: aBBRate: Automating BBR Attack Exploration Using a Model-Based Approach
papers.authors: Anthony Peterson, Samuel Jero, Md. Endadul Hoque, David R. Choffnes, Cristina Nita-Rotaru
papers.abstract: BBR is a new congestion control algorithm proposed by Google that builds a model of the network path consisting of its bottleneck bandwidth and RTT to govern its sending rate rather than packet loss (like CUBIC and many other popular congestion control algorithms). Loss-based congestion control has been shown to be vulnerable to acknowledgment manipulation attacks. However, no prior work has investigated how to design such attacks for BBR, nor how effective they are in practice. In this paper we systematically analyze the vulnerability of BBR to acknowledgement manipulation attacks. We create the first detailed BBR finite state machine and a novel algorithm for inferring its current BBR state at runtime by passively observing network traffic. We then adapt and apply a TCP fuzzer to the Linux TCP BBR v1.0 implementation. Our approach generated 30,297 attack strategies, of which 8,859 misled BBR about actual network conditions. From these, we identify 5 classes of attacks causing BBR to send faster, slower or stall. We also found that BBR is immune to acknowledgment burst, division and duplication attacks that were previously shown to be effective against loss-based congestion control such as TCP New Reno.
papers.abstract_zh: BBR是谷歌提出的一种新的拥塞控制算法，它建立了一个由瓶颈带宽和RTT组成的网络路径模型，以控制其发送速率而不是数据包丢失(像CUBIC和许多其他流行的拥塞控制算法)。基于丢失的拥塞控制已被证明易受确认操纵攻击。然而，先前的工作没有调查如何为BBR设计这样的攻击，也没有调查它们在实践中有多有效。本文系统地分析了BBR对确认操纵攻击的脆弱性。我们创建了第一个详细的BBR有限状态机和一个新颖的算法，用于在运行时通过被动观察网络流量来推断其当前的BBR状态。然后，我们将TCP fuzzer应用于Linux TCP BBR 1.0版实现。我们的方法产生了30，297个攻击策略，其中8，859个在实际网络条件方面误导了BBR。由此，我们确定了导致BBR发送更快、更慢或停止的5类攻击。我们还发现，BBR不受确认突发、分割和复制攻击的影响，这些攻击以前被证明对基于丢失的拥塞控制(如TCP New Reno)是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 缩写:使用基于模型的方法自动探测BBR攻击

papers.title: Cyber Threat Intelligence Modeling Based on Heterogeneous Graph Convolutional Network
papers.authors: Jun Zhao, Qiben Yan, Xudong Liu, Bo Li, Guangsheng Zuo
papers.abstract: Cyber Threat Intelligence (CTI), as a collection of threat information, has been widely used in industry to defend against prevalent cyber attacks. CTI is commonly represented as Indicator of Compromise (IOC) for formalizing threat actors. However, current CTI studies pose three major limitations: ﬁrst, the accuracy of IOC extraction is low; second, isolated IOC hardly depicts the comprehensive landscape of threat events; third, the interdependent relationships among heterogeneous IOCs, which can be leveraged to mine deep security insights, are unexplored. In this paper, we propose a novel CTI framework, HINTI, to model the interdependent relationships among heterogeneous IOCs to quantify their relevance. Speciﬁcally, we ﬁrst propose multi-granular attention based IOC recognition method to boost the accuracy of IOC extraction. We then model the interdependent relationships among IOCs using a newly constructed heterogeneous information network (HIN). To explore intricate security knowledge, we propose a threat intelligence computing framework based on graph convolutional networks for effective knowledge discovery. Experimental results demonstrate that our proposed IOC extraction approach outperforms existing state-of-the-art methods, and HINTI can model and quantify the underlying relationships among heterogeneous IOCs, shedding new light on the evolving threat landscape.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络威胁情报(CTI)作为威胁信息的集合，已被广泛应用于工业领域，以抵御流行的网络攻击。CTI通常被表示为威胁参与者形式化的折衷指标(IOC)。然而，目前的CTI研究提出了三个主要限制:首先，IOC提取的准确性较低；第二，孤立的国际奥委会很难描绘威胁事件的全貌；第三，异构IOC之间的相互依赖关系，可以用来挖掘深层的安全见解，是未经探索的。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个新的CTI框架HINTI，来模拟异构IOC之间的相互依赖关系，以量化它们的相关性。具体而言，我们首先提出了基于多粒度注意力的IOC识别方法，以提高IOC提取的准确性。然后，我们使用新构建的异构信息网络(HIN)对IOC之间的相互依赖关系进行建模。为了探索复杂的安全知识，我们提出了一个基于图卷积网络的威胁情报计算框架，用于有效的知识发现。实验结果表明，我们提出的IOC提取方法优于现有的最先进的方法，HINTI可以对异构IOC之间的潜在关系进行建模和量化，为不断发展的威胁前景提供了新的线索。
papers.title_zh: 基于异构图卷积网络的网络威胁情报建模

papers.title: Detecting Lateral Movement in Enterprise Computer Networks with Unsupervised Graph AI
papers.authors: Benjamin Bowman, Craig Laprade, Yuede Ji, H. Howie Huang
papers.abstract: In this paper we present a technique for detecting lateral movement of Advanced Persistent Threats inside enterprise-level computer networks using unsupervised graph learning. Our detection technique utilizes information derived from industry standard logging practices, rendering it immediately deployable to real-world enterprise networks. Importantly, this technique is fully unsupervised, not requiring any labeled training data, making it highly generalizable to different environments. The approach consists of two core components: an authentication graph, and an unsupervised graph-based machine learning pipeline which learns latent representations of the authenticating entities, and subsequently performs anomaly detection by identifying low-probability authentication events via a learned logistic regression link predictor. We apply this technique to authentication data derived from two contrasting data sources: a small-scale simulated environment, and a large-scale real-world environment. We are able to detect malicious authentication events associated with lateral movement with a true positive rate of 85% and false positive rate of 0.9%, compared to 72% and 4.4% by traditional rule-based heuristics and non-graph anomaly detection algorithms. In addition, we have designed several ﬁlters to further reduce the false positive rate by nearly 40%, while reducing true positives by less than 1%.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了一种使用无监督图学习来检测企业级计算机网络中高级持久威胁的横向移动的技术。我们的检测技术利用来自行业标准日志记录实践的信息，使其能够立即部署到现实世界的企业网络中。重要的是，这项技术是完全无监督的，不需要任何标记的训练数据，使其高度可推广到不同的环境。该方法包括两个核心组件:认证图和无监督的基于图的机器学习管道，该管道学习认证实体的潜在表示，并随后通过经学习的逻辑回归链接预测器识别低概率认证事件来执行异常检测。我们将这种技术应用于从两个对比数据源导出的认证数据:小规模模拟环境和大规模真实环境。我们能够以85%的真阳性率和0.9%的假阳性率检测与横向移动相关联的恶意认证事件，相比之下，传统的基于规则的启发式算法和非图异常检测算法的真阳性率为72%和4.4%。此外，我们还设计了几款滤波器，将假阳性率进一步降低近40%，而真阳性率降低不到1%。
papers.title_zh: 用无监督图人工智能检测企业计算机网络中的横向移动

papers.title: An Object Detection based Solver for Google's Image reCAPTCHA v2
papers.authors: Md Imran Hossen, Yazhou Tu, Md Fazle Rabby, Md. Nazmul Islam, Hui Cao, Xiali Sharon Hei
papers.abstract: Previous work showed that reCAPTCHA v2’s image challenges could be solved by automated programs armed with Deep Neural Network (DNN) image classifiers and vision APIs provided by off-the-shelf image recognition services. In response to emerging threats, Google has made significant updates to its image reCAPTCHA v2 challenges that can render the prior approaches ineffective to a great extent. In this paper, we investigate the robustness of the latest version of reCAPTCHA v2 against advanced object detection based solvers. We propose a fully automated object detection based system that breaks the most advanced challenges of reCAPTCHA v2 with an online success rate of 83.25%, the highest success rate to date, and it takes only 19.93 seconds (including network delays) on average to crack a challenge. We also study the updated security features of reCAPTCHA v2, such as anti-recognition mechanisms, improved anti-bot detection techniques, and adjustable security preferences. Our extensive experiments show that while these security features can provide some resistance against automated attacks, adversaries can still bypass most of them. Our experimental findings indicate that the recent advances in object detection technologies pose a severe threat to the security of image captcha designs relying on simple object detection as their underlying AI problem.
papers.abstract_zh: 之前的工作表明，reCAPTCHA v2的图像挑战可以通过配备深度神经网络(DNN)图像分类器和现成图像识别服务提供的视觉API的自动化程序来解决。为了应对新出现的威胁，谷歌对其image reCAPTCHA v2挑战进行了重大更新，这些挑战可以在很大程度上使以前的方法无效。在本文中，我们研究了reCAPTCHA v2的最新版本对基于高级对象检测的解算器的鲁棒性。我们提出了一种基于全自动对象检测的系统，该系统以83.25%的在线成功率(迄今为止最高的成功率)打破了reCAPTCHA v2的最高级挑战，并且平均只需要19.93秒(包括网络延迟)来破解挑战。我们还研究了reCAPTCHA v2更新的安全特性，如反识别机制、改进的反机器人检测技术和可调整的安全首选项。我们的大量实验表明，虽然这些安全功能可以对自动攻击提供一些抵抗，但对手仍然可以绕过其中的大多数。我们的实验结果表明，对象检测技术的最新进展对依赖简单对象检测作为其潜在AI问题的图像验证码设计的安全性构成了严重威胁。
papers.title_zh: 一个基于对象检测的谷歌图像reCAPTCHA v2求解器

papers.title: Evasion Attacks against Banking Fraud Detection Systems
papers.authors: Michele Carminati, Luca Santini, Mario Polino, Stefano Zanero
papers.abstract: Machine learning models are vulnerable to adversarial samples: inputs crafted to deceive a classiﬁer. Adversarial samples crafted against one model can be effective also against related models. Therefore, even without a comprehensive knowledge of the target system, a malicious agent can attack it by training a surrogate model and crafting evasive samples. Unlike the image classiﬁcation context, the banking fraud detection domain is characterized by samples with few aggregated features. This characteristic makes conventional approaches hardly applicable to the banking fraud context. In this paper, we study the application of Adversarial Machine Learning (AML) techniques to the banking fraud detection domain. To this end, we identify the main challenges and design a novel approach to perform evasion attacks. Using two real bank datasets, we evaluate the security of several state-of-the-art fraud detection systems by deploying evasion attacks with different degrees of attacker’s knowledge. We show that the outcome of the attack is strictly dependent on the target fraud detector, with an evasion rate ranging from 60% to 100%. Interestingly, our results show that the increase of attacker knowledge does not signiﬁcantly increase the attack success rate, except for the full knowledge scenario.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习模型容易受到敌对样本的攻击:精心制作的输入来欺骗分类器。针对一个模型制作的对立样本也可能对相关模型有效。因此，即使没有目标系统的全面知识，恶意代理也可以通过训练代理模型和制作规避样本来攻击它。与图像分类环境不同，银行欺诈检测领域的特点是样本的聚合特征很少。这一特点使得传统方法很难适用于银行欺诈。在本文中，我们研究了对抗性机器学习(AML)技术在银行欺诈检测领域的应用。为此，我们确定了主要的挑战，并设计了一种新的方法来执行规避攻击。使用两个真实的银行数据集，我们通过部署具有不同程度攻击者知识的规避攻击来评估几个最先进的欺诈检测系统的安全性。我们证明攻击的结果严格依赖于目标欺诈检测器，逃避率从60%到100%不等。有趣的是，我们的结果表明，攻击者知识的增加并没有显著增加攻击成功率，除了完全知识场景。
papers.title_zh: 针对银行欺诈检测系统的规避攻击

papers.title: The Limitations of Federated Learning in Sybil Settings
papers.authors: Clement Fung, Chris J. M. Yoon, Ivan Beschastnikh
papers.abstract: Federated learning over distributed multi-party data is an emerging paradigm that iteratively aggregates updates from a group of devices to train a globally shared model. Relying on a set of devices, however, opens up the door for sybil attacks: malicious devices may be controlled by a single adversary who directs these devices to attack the system. We consider the susceptibility of federated learning to sybil attacks and propose a taxonomy of sybil objectives and strategies in this setting. We describe a new DoS attack that we term training inflation and present several ways to carry out this attack. We then evaluate recent distributed ML fault tolerance proposals and show that these are insufficient to mitigate several sybil-based attacks. Finally, we introduce a defense against targeted sybil-based poisoning called FoolsGold, which identifies sybils based on the diversity of client updates. We show that FoolsGold exceeds state of the art approaches when countering several types of poisoning attacks. Our work is open source and is available online: https://github.com/DistributedML/FoolsGold
papers.abstract_zh: 分布式多方数据上的联合学习是一种新兴的范式，它迭代地聚集来自一组设备的更新，以训练全局共享的模型。然而，依赖一组设备为sybil攻击打开了大门:恶意设备可能由一个对手控制，他指挥这些设备攻击系统。我们考虑了联合学习对sybil攻击的敏感性，并提出了在这种情况下sybil目标和策略的分类。我们描述了一种新的DoS攻击，我们称之为训练膨胀，并提出了实施这种攻击的几种方法。然后，我们评估了最近的分布式ML容错提议，并表明这些提议不足以减轻几种基于sybil的攻击。最后，我们介绍了一种针对基于sybil的针对性中毒的防御方法，称为FoolsGold，它根据客户端更新的多样性来识别Sybil。我们表明，在对抗几种类型的中毒攻击时，FoolsGold超过了最先进的方法。我们的工作是开源的，可以在网上找到:https://github.com/DistributedML/FoolsGold
papers.title_zh: Sybil环境下联合学习的局限性

papers.title: GhostImage: Remote Perception Attacks against Camera-based Image Classification Systems
papers.authors: Yanmao Man, Ming Li, Ryan M. Gerdes
papers.abstract:
In vision-based object classification systems imaging sensors perceive the environment and machine learning is then used to detect and classify objects for decision-making purposes; e.g., to maneuver an automated vehicle around an obstacle or to raise an alarm to indicate the presence of an intruder in surveillance settings. In this work we demonstrate how the perception domain can be remotely and unobtrusively exploited to enable an attacker to create spurious objects or alter an existing object. An automated system relying on a detection/classification framework subject to our attack could be made to undertake actions with catastrophic results due to attacker-induced misperception. 
We focus on camera-based systems and show that it is possible to remotely project adversarial patterns into camera systems by exploiting two common effects in optical imaging systems, viz., lens flare/ghost effects and auto-exposure control. To improve the robustness of the attack to channel effects, we generate optimal patterns by integrating adversarial machine learning techniques with a trained end-to-end channel model. We experimentally demonstrate our attacks using a low-cost projector, on three different image datasets, in indoor and outdoor environments, and with three different cameras. Experimental results show that, depending on the projector-camera distance, attack success rates can reach as high as 100% and under targeted conditions.
papers.abstract_zh:
在基于视觉的对象分类系统中，成像传感器感知环境，然后使用机器学习来检测和分类对象以用于决策目的；例如操纵自动车辆绕过障碍物或发出警报以指示监视环境中入侵者的存在。在这项工作中，我们展示了如何远程和不引人注目地利用感知域，使攻击者能够创建伪造的对象或改变现有的对象。依赖于检测/分类框架的自动化系统受到我们的攻击时，可能会由于攻击者引起的误解而采取具有灾难性结果的行动。
我们关注基于摄像机的系统，并表明通过利用光学成像系统中的两种常见效应，即、镜头眩光/重影效果和自动曝光控制。为了提高攻击对信道效应的鲁棒性，我们通过将对抗性机器学习技术与经过训练的端到端信道模型相结合来生成最佳模式。我们使用低成本投影仪，在室内和室外环境下，在三个不同的图像数据集上，使用三个不同的摄像机，实验性地演示了我们的攻击。实验结果表明，根据投影仪-摄像机的距离，在目标条件下，攻击成功率可以高达100%。
papers.title_zh: GhostImage:针对基于摄像机的图像分类系统的远程感知攻击

papers.title: PLC-Sleuth: Detecting and Localizing PLC Intrusions Using Control Invariants
papers.authors: Zeyu Yang, Liang He, Peng Cheng, Jiming Chen, David K. Y. Yau, Linkang Du
papers.abstract: Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs) are the ground of control systems, which are however, vulnerable to a variety of cyber attacks, especially for networked control systems. To mitigate this issue, we design PLC-Sleuth, a novel non-invasive intrusion detection/localization system for PLCs, grounding on a set of control invariants — i.e., the correlations between sensor readings and the concomitantly triggered PLC commands — that exist pervasively in all control systems. Specifically, taking the system’s Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition log as input, PLC-Sleuth abstracts/identifies the system’s control invariants as a control graph using data-driven structure learning, and then monitors the weights of graph edges to detect anomalies thereof, which is in turn, a sign of intrusion. We have implemented and evaluated PLC-Sleuth using both a prototype of Secure Ethanol Distillation System (SEDS) and a realistically simulated Tennessee Eastman (TE) process.
papers.abstract_zh: 可编程逻辑控制器(PLC)是控制系统的基础，但容易受到各种网络攻击，尤其是网络控制系统。为了缓解这一问题，我们设计了PLC-Sleuth，这是一种用于PLC的新型非侵入式入侵检测/定位系统，基于一组控制不变量，即传感器读数和伴随触发的PLC命令之间的相关性，这些变量普遍存在于所有控制系统中。具体而言，将系统的监督控制和数据采集日志作为输入，PLC-Sleuth使用数据驱动的结构学习将系统的控制不变量提取/识别为控制图，然后监控图边的权重以检测其异常，这反过来是入侵的迹象。我们已经使用安全乙醇蒸馏系统(SEDS)的原型和真实模拟的田纳西伊士曼(TE)过程实现并评估了PLC-Sleuth。
papers.title_zh: PLC-Sleuth:使用控制不变量检测和定位PLC入侵

papers.title: Software-based Realtime Recovery from Sensor Attacks on Robotic Vehicles
papers.authors: Hongjun Choi, Sayali Kate, Yousra Aafer, Xiangyu Zhang, Dongyan Xu
papers.abstract: We present a novel technique to recover robotic vehicles (RVs) from various sensor attacks with so-called software sensors. Specifically, our technique builds a predictive statespace model based on the generic system identification technique. Sensor measurement prediction based on the statespace model runs as a software backup of the corresponding physical sensor. When physical sensors are under attacks, the corresponding software sensors can isolate and recover the compromised sensors individually to prevent further damage. We apply our prototype to various sensor attacks on six RV systems, including a real quadrotor and a rover. Our evaluation results demonstrate that our technique can practically and safely recover the vehicle from various attacks on multiple sensors under different maneuvers, preventing crashes.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种新的技术来恢复机器人车辆(RVs)从各种传感器攻击所谓的软件传感器。具体地说，我们的技术建立了一个基于通用系统辨识技术的预测状态空间模型。基于状态空间模型的传感器测量预测作为相应物理传感器的软件备份运行。当物理传感器受到攻击时，相应的软件传感器可以单独隔离和恢复受损的传感器，以防止进一步的损害。我们将我们的原型应用于六个RV系统的各种传感器攻击，包括一个真实的四旋翼飞行器和一个漫游器。我们的评估结果表明，我们的技术可以实际和安全地恢复车辆在不同机动下对多个传感器的各种攻击，防止撞车。
papers.title_zh: 基于软件的机器人车辆传感器攻击的实时恢复

papers.title: SIEVE: Secure In-Vehicle Automatic Speech Recognition Systems
papers.authors: Shu Wang, Jiahao Cao, Kun Sun, Qi Li
papers.abstract: Driverless vehicles are becoming an irreversible trend in our daily lives, and humans can interact with cars through invehicle voice control systems. However, the automatic speech recognition (ASR) module in the voice control systems is vulnerable to adversarial voice commands, which may cause unexpected behaviors or even accidents in driverless cars. Due to the high demand on security insurance, it remains as a challenge to defend in-vehicle ASR systems against adversarial voice commands from various sources in a noisy driving environment. In this paper, we develop a secure in-vehicle ASR system called SIEVE, which can effectively distinguish voice commands issued from the driver, passengers, or electronic speakers in three steps. First, it filters out multiple-source voice commands from multiple vehicle speakers by leveraging an autocorrelation analysis. Second, it identifies if a single-source voice command is from humans or electronic speakers using a novel dual-domain detection method. Finally, it leverages the directions of voice sources to distinguish the voice of the driver from those of the passengers. We implement a prototype of SIEVE and perform a real-world study under different driving conditions. Experimental results show SIEVE can defeat various adversarial voice commands over in-vehicle ASR systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 无人驾驶汽车正在成为我们日常生活中不可逆转的趋势，人类可以通过车载语音控制系统与汽车互动。然而，语音控制系统中的自动语音识别(ASR)模块容易受到对抗性语音命令的影响，这可能会导致无人驾驶汽车出现意外行为甚至事故。由于对安全保险的高需求，在嘈杂的驾驶环境中保护车载ASR系统免受来自各种来源的对抗性语音命令仍然是一个挑战。在本文中，我们开发了一个名为SIEVE的安全车载ASR系统，它可以通过三个步骤有效地区分来自司机、乘客或电子扬声器的语音命令。首先，它通过利用自相关分析过滤掉来自多个车辆扬声器的多源语音命令。其次，它使用一种新颖的双域检测方法来识别单源语音命令是来自人类还是电子扬声器。最后，它利用声音源的方向来区分司机和乘客的声音。我们实现了一个SIEVE原型，并在不同的驾驶条件下进行了真实世界的研究。实验结果表明，SIEVE可以在车载ASR系统上挫败各种敌对的语音命令。
papers.title_zh: SIEVE:安全车载自动语音识别系统

papers.title: μSBS: Static Binary Sanitization of Bare-metal Embedded Devices for Fault Observability
papers.authors: Majid Salehi, Danny Hughes, Bruno Crispo
papers.abstract: A large portion of the already deployed Internet of Things (IoT) devices are bare-metal. In a bare-metal device, the firmware executes directly on the hardware with no intermediary OS. While bare-metal devices increase efficiency and flexibility, they are also subject to memory corruption vulnerabilities that are regularly uncovered. Fuzzing is an effective and popular software testing method to discover vulnerabilities. The effectiveness of fuzzing approaches relies on the fact that memory corruption faults, by violating existing security mechanisms such as MMU, are observable, thus relatively easy to debug. Unfortunately, bare-metal devices lack such security mechanisms. Consequently, fuzzing approaches encounter silent memory corruptions with no visible effects making debugging extremely difficult. This paper tackles this problem by proposing μSBS, a novel approach that, by statically instrumenting the binaries, makes memory corruptions observable. In contrast to prior work, μSBS does not need to reverse engineer the firmware. The approach is practical as it does not require a modified compiler and can perform policy-based instrumentation of firmware without access to source code. Evaluation of μSBS shows that it reduces security analyst effort, while discovering the same set of memory error types as prior work.
papers.abstract_zh: 已经部署的物联网(IoT)设备中有很大一部分是裸机。在裸机设备中，固件直接在硬件上执行，无需中间操作系统。虽然裸机设备提高了效率和灵活性，但它们也容易受到经常被发现的内存损坏漏洞的影响。模糊化是一种有效且流行的发现漏洞的软件测试方法。模糊化方法的有效性依赖于这样一个事实，即通过违反诸如MMU的现有安全机制，存储器损坏故障是可观察到的，因此相对容易调试。不幸的是，裸机设备缺乏这种安全机制。因此，模糊化方法会遇到没有明显影响的静默内存损坏，这使得调试极其困难。本文通过提出μSBS来解决这个问题，μSBS是一种新的方法，通过静态检测二进制文件，使内存损坏变得可见。与之前的工作相比，μSBS不需要对固件进行逆向工程。该方法是实用的，因为它不需要修改编译器，并且可以在不访问源代码的情况下执行基于策略的固件检测。对μSBS的评估表明，它减少了安全分析师的工作量，同时发现了与先前工作相同的一组内存错误类型。
papers.title_zh: μSBS:裸机嵌入式设备故障可观测性的静态二进制净化

papers.title: BlueShield: Detecting Spoofing Attacks in Bluetooth Low Energy Networks
papers.authors: Jianliang Wu, Yuhong Nan, Vireshwar Kumar, Mathias Payer, Dongyan Xu
papers.abstract: Many IoT devices are equipped with Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to support communication in an energy-efficient manner. Unfortunately, BLE is prone to spoofing attacks where an attacker can impersonate a benign BLE device and feed malicious data to its users. Defending against spoofing attacks is extremely difficult as security patches to mitigate them may not be adopted across vendors promptly; not to mention the millions of legacy BLE devices with limited I/O capabilities that do not support firmware updates. As a first line of defense against spoofing attacks, we propose BlueShield, a legacy-friendly, non-intrusive monitoring system. BlueShield is motivated by the observation that all spoofing attacks result in anomalies in certain cyber-physical features of the advertising packets containing the BLE device’s identity. BlueShield leverages these features to detect anomalous packets generated by an attacker. More importantly, the unique design of BlueShield makes it robust against an advanced attacker with the capability to mimic all features. BlueShield can be deployed on low-cost off-the-shelf platforms, and does not require any modification in the BLE device or its user. Our evaluation with nine common BLE devices deployed in a real-world office environment validates that BlueShield can effectively detect spoofing attacks at a very low false positive and false negative rate.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多物联网设备都配备了低能耗蓝牙(BLE ),以高能效方式支持通信。不幸的是，BLE容易受到欺骗攻击，攻击者可以冒充良性BLE设备并向其用户提供恶意数据。防御欺骗攻击是极其困难的，因为减轻这些攻击的安全补丁可能不会被供应商迅速采用；更不用说数百万I/O能力有限、不支持固件更新的传统BLE设备了。作为对抗欺骗攻击的第一道防线，我们提出了BlueShield，一个传统友好的非侵入式监控系统。BlueShield的动机是观察到所有欺骗攻击都会导致包含BLE设备身份的广告数据包的某些网络物理特征异常。BlueShield利用这些功能来检测攻击者生成的异常数据包。更重要的是，BlueShield的独特设计使其能够抵御具有模仿所有功能的高级攻击者。BlueShield可以部署在低成本的现成平台上，不需要对BLE设备或其用户进行任何修改。我们对部署在真实办公环境中的九种常见BLE设备的评估验证了BlueShield可以以非常低的误报率和漏报率有效地检测欺骗攻击。
papers.title_zh: 蓝盾:检测蓝牙低能耗网络中的欺骗攻击

papers.title: Dark Firmware: A Systematic Approach to Exploring Application Security Risks in the Presence of Untrusted Firmware
papers.authors: Duha Ibdah, Nada Lachtar, Abdulrahman Abu Elkhail, Anys Bacha, Hafiz Malik
papers.abstract: Compromising lower levels of the computing stack is attractive to attackers since malware that resides in layers that span firmware and hardware are notoriously difficult to detect and remove. This trend raises concerns about the security of the system components that we have grown accustomed to trusting, especially as the number of supply chain attacks continues to rise. In this work, we explore the risks associated with application security in the presence of untrusted firmware. We present a novel firmware attack that leverages system management cycles to covertly collect data from the application layer. We show that system interrupts that are used for managing the platform, can be leveraged to extract sensitive application data from outgoing requests even when the HTTPS protocol is used. We evaluate the robustness of our attack under diverse and stressful application usage conditions running on Ubuntu 18.04 and Android 8.1 operating systems. We conduct a proof-of-concept implementation of the attack using firmware configured to run with the aforementioned OSs and a mix of popular applications without disrupting the normal functionality of the system. Finally, we discuss a possible countermeasure that can be used to defend against firmware attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 危及较低级别的计算栈对攻击者来说是有吸引力的，因为众所周知，驻留在跨越固件和硬件的层中的恶意软件难以检测和移除。这一趋势引发了人们对我们已经习惯于信任的系统组件的安全性的担忧，尤其是在供应链攻击数量持续上升的情况下。在这项工作中，我们探讨了在不可信固件存在的情况下与应用安全相关的风险。我们提出了一种新颖的固件攻击，它利用系统管理周期从应用层秘密收集数据。我们表明，即使在使用HTTPS协议的情况下，用于管理平台的系统中断也可以用来从传出的请求中提取敏感的应用程序数据。我们评估了我们的攻击在Ubuntu 18.04和Android 8.1操作系统上运行的多样化和紧张的应用程序使用条件下的鲁棒性。我们使用配置为与上述操作系统和流行应用程序混合运行的固件，在不中断系统正常功能的情况下，对攻击进行了概念验证。最后，我们讨论一个可能的对策，可以用来抵御固件攻击。
papers.title_zh: 黑暗固件:在不可信固件存在的情况下探索应用程序安全风险的系统方法

papers.title: A Framework for Software Diversification with ISA Heterogeneity
papers.authors: Xiaoguang Wang, SengMing Yeoh, Robert Lyerly, Pierre Olivier, Sang-Hoon Kim, Binoy Ravindran
papers.abstract: Software diversification is one of the most effective ways to defeat memory corruption based attacks. Traditional software diversification such as code randomization techniques diversifies program memory layout and makes it difficult for attackers to pinpoint the precise location of a target vulnerability. Some recent work in the architecture community use diverse ISA configurations to defeat code injection or code reuse attacks, showing that dynamically switching the ISA on which a program executes is a promising direction for future security systems. However, most of these work either remain in a simulation stage or require extra efforts to write program. In this paper, we propose HeterSec, a framework to secure applications utilizing a heterogeneous ISA setup composed of real world machines. HeterSec runs on top of commodity x86_64 and ARM64 machines and gives the process the illusion that it runs on a multi-ISA chip multiprocessor (CMP) machine. With HeterSec, a process can dynamically select its underlying ISA environment. Therefore, a protected process would be capable of hiding the instruction set on which it executed or detecting abnormal program behavior by comparing execution results step-by-step from multiple ISA-diversified instances. To demonstrate the effectiveness of such a software framework, we implemented HeterSec on Linux and showcased its deployability by running it on a pair of x86_64 and ARM64 servers, connected over InfiniBand. We then conducted two case studies with HeterSec. In the first case, we implemented a multi-ISA moving target defense (MTD) system, which introduces uncertainty at the instruction set level. In the second case, we implemented a multi-ISA-based multi-version execution (MVX) system. The evaluation results show that HeterSec brings security benefits through ISA diversification with a reasonable performance overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 软件多样化是击败基于内存损坏的攻击的最有效方法之一。传统的软件多样化(如代码随机化技术)使程序内存布局多样化，并使攻击者难以精确定位目标漏洞。架构社区最近的一些工作使用不同的ISA配置来抵御代码注入或代码重用攻击，表明动态切换程序执行的ISA是未来安全系统的一个有前途的方向。然而，大多数这些工作要么停留在模拟阶段，要么需要额外努力来编写程序。在本文中，我们提出了HeterSec，一个利用由真实世界机器组成的异构ISA设置来保护应用程序的框架。HeterSec运行在商用x86_64和ARM64机器上，并给进程一种运行在多ISA芯片多处理器(CMP)机器上的错觉。使用HeterSec，一个进程可以动态地选择它的底层ISA环境。因此，受保护的进程将能够隐藏它在其上执行的指令集，或者通过逐步比较来自多个ISA多样化实例的执行结果来检测异常程序行为。为了证明这种软件框架的有效性，我们在Linux上实现了HeterSec，并通过在一对x86_64和ARM64服务器上运行它来展示其可部署性，这两个服务器通过InfiniBand连接。然后，我们对HeterSec进行了两个案例研究。在第一种情况下，我们实现了一个多ISA移动目标防御(MTD)系统，它在指令集级别引入了不确定性。在第二种情况下，我们实现了一个基于多ISA的多版本执行(MVX)系统。评估结果表明，HeterSec以合理的性能开销通过ISA多样化带来了安全效益。
papers.title_zh: 具有ISA异构性的软件多样化框架

papers.title: Confine: Automated System Call Policy Generation for Container Attack Surface Reduction
papers.authors: Seyedhamed Ghavamnia, Tapti Palit, Azzedine Benameur, Michalis Polychronakis
papers.abstract: Reducing the attack surface of the OS kernel is a promising defense-in-depth approach for mitigating the fragile isolation guarantees of container environments. In contrast to hypervisor-based systems, malicious containers can exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying kernel to fully compromise the host and all other containers running on it. Previous container attack surface reduction efforts have relied on dynamic analysis and training using realistic workloads to limit the set of system calls exposed to containers. These approaches, however, do not capture exhaustively all the code that can potentially be needed by future workloads or rare runtime conditions, and are thus not appropriate as a generic solution. Aiming to provide a practical solution for the protection of arbitrary containers, in this paper we present a generic approach for the automated generation of restrictive system call policies for Docker containers. Our system, named Confine, uses static code analysis to inspect the containerized application and all its dependencies, identify the superset of system calls required for the correct operation of the container, and generate a corresponding Seccomp system call policy that can be readily enforced while loading the container. The results of our experimental evaluation with 150 publicly available Docker images show that Confine can successfully reduce their attack surface by disabling 145 or more system calls (out of 326) for more than half of the containers, which neutralizes 51 previously disclosed kernel vulnerabilities.
papers.abstract_zh: 减少操作系统内核的攻击面是一种很有前途的深度防御方法，可以减轻容器环境脆弱的隔离保证。与基于虚拟机管理程序的系统相比，恶意容器可以利用底层内核中的漏洞来完全危害主机和在其上运行的所有其他容器。以前的容器攻击面减少工作依赖于使用实际工作负载的动态分析和训练，以限制暴露给容器的系统调用集。然而，这些方法不能详尽地捕获未来工作负载或罕见的运行时条件可能需要的所有代码，因此不适合作为通用解决方案。为了给任意容器的保护提供一个实用的解决方案，本文提出了一种自动生成Docker容器限制性系统调用策略的通用方法。我们的系统名为Confine，使用静态代码分析来检查容器化的应用程序及其所有依赖项，识别容器正确操作所需的系统调用的超集，并生成相应的Seccomp系统调用策略，该策略可以在加载容器时容易地实施。我们使用150个公开可用的Docker映像进行实验评估的结果显示，Confine可以通过禁用超过一半的容器的145个或更多系统调用(总共326个)来成功减少它们的攻击面，从而消除51个先前披露的内核漏洞。
papers.title_zh: Confine:减少容器攻击面的自动系统调用策略生成

papers.title: sysfilter: Automated System Call Filtering for Commodity Software
papers.authors: Nicholas DeMarinis, Kent Williams-King, Di Jin, Rodrigo Fonseca, Vasileios P. Kemerlis
papers.abstract: Modern OSes provide a rich set of services to applications, primarily accessible via the system call API, to support the ever growing functionality of contemporary software. However, despite the fact that applications require access to part of the system call API (to function properly), OS kernels allow full and unrestricted use of the entire system call set. This not only violates the principle of least privilege, but also enables attackers to utilize extra OS services, after seizing control of vulnerable applications, or escalate privileges further via exploiting vulnerabilities in less-stressed kernel interfaces. To tackle this problem, we present sysfilter: a binary analysis-based framework that automatically (1) limits what OS services attackers can (ab)use, by enforcing the principle of least privilege with respect to the system call API, and (2) reduces the attack surface of the kernel, by restricting the system call set available to userland processes. We implement sysfilter for x86-64 Linux, and present a set of program analyses for constructing system call sets statically, and in a scalable, precise, and complete (safe over-approximation) manner. In addition, we evaluate our prototype in terms of correctness using 411 binaries (real-world C/C++ applications) and ≈38.5K tests to assert their functionality. Furthermore, we measure the impact of our enforcement mechanism(s), demonstrating minimal, or negligible, run-time slowdown. Lastly, we conclude with a large scale study of the system call profile of ≈30K C/C++ applications (from Debian sid), reporting insights that justify our design and can aid that of future (system call-based) policing mechanisms.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代操作系统为应用程序提供了丰富的服务，主要通过系统调用API来访问，以支持当代软件不断增长的功能。然而，尽管应用程序需要访问系统调用API的一部分(以正常运行)，操作系统内核允许完全和不受限制地使用整个系统调用集。这不仅违反了最小权限原则，还使攻击者能够在控制易受攻击的应用程序后利用额外的操作系统服务，或者通过利用压力较小的内核接口中的漏洞来进一步提升权限。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了sysfilter:一个基于二进制分析的框架，它自动(1)通过对系统调用API实施最小特权原则来限制攻击者可以(ab)使用什么操作系统服务，以及(2)通过限制用户域进程可用的系统调用集来减少内核的攻击面。我们实现了用于x86-64 Linux的sysfilter，并给出了一组程序分析，用于以可伸缩、精确和完整(安全过近似)的方式静态地构造系统调用集。此外，我们使用411个二进制文件(真实世界的C/C++应用程序)和≈38.5K测试来评估我们的原型的正确性，以断言它们的功能。此外，我们测量了我们的实施机制的影响，证明了最小的或者可以忽略的运行时减速。最后，我们以对大约30K C/C++应用程序(来自Debian sid)的系统调用配置文件的大规模研究作为结论，报告了证明我们的设计是正确的并且可以帮助未来(基于系统调用的)监管机制的见解。
papers.title_zh: sysfilter:商业软件的自动系统调用过滤

papers.title: Be Sensitive and Collaborative: Analyzing Impact of Coverage Metrics in Greybox Fuzzing
papers.authors: Jinghan Wang, Yue Duan, Wei Song, Heng Yin, Chengyu Song
papers.abstract: Coverage-guided greybox fuzzing has become one of the most common techniques for finding software bugs. Coverage metric, which decides how a fuzzer selects new seeds, is an essential parameter of fuzzing and can significantly affect the results. While there are many existing works on the effectiveness of different coverage metrics on software testing, little is known about how different coverage metrics could actually affect the fuzzing results in practice. More importantly, it is unclear whether there exists one coverage metric that is superior to all the other metrics. In this paper, we report the first systematic study on the impact of different coverage metrics in fuzzing. To this end, we formally define and discuss the concept of sensitivity, which can be used to theoretically compare different coverage metrics. We then present several coverage metrics with their variants. We conduct a study on these metrics with the DARPA CGC dataset, the LAVA-M dataset, and a set of real-world applications (a total of 221 binaries). We find that because each fuzzing instance has limited resources (time and computation power), (1) each metric has its unique merit in terms of flipping certain types of branches (thus vulnerability finding) and (2) there is no grand slam coverage metric that defeats all the others. We also explore combining different coverage metrics through cross-seeding, and the result is very encouraging: this pure fuzzing based approach can crash at least the same numbers of binaries in the CGC dataset as a previous approach (Driller) that combines fuzzing and concolic execution. At the same time, our approach uses fewer computing resources.
papers.abstract_zh: 覆盖引导的灰箱模糊化已经成为发现软件缺陷的最常见的技术之一。覆盖度量决定了模糊器如何选择新种子，是模糊化的一个重要参数，对模糊化的结果有很大的影响。虽然有许多关于不同覆盖度量在软件测试中的有效性的现有工作，但是很少有人知道不同的覆盖度量在实践中如何实际影响模糊结果。更重要的是，不清楚是否存在一个覆盖度量优于所有其他度量。在本文中，我们报告了第一次系统研究的影响，不同的覆盖度量在模糊化。为此，我们正式定义并讨论了灵敏度的概念，它可以用来从理论上比较不同的覆盖度量。然后，我们提出了几个覆盖度量及其变体。我们使用DARPA CGC数据集、LAVA-M数据集和一组真实世界的应用程序(总共221个二进制文件)对这些指标进行了研究。我们发现，因为每个模糊化实例都有有限的资源(时间和计算能力)，(1)每个度量在翻转某些类型的分支(从而发现漏洞)方面都有其独特的优点，以及(2)不存在击败所有其他度量的大满贯覆盖度量。我们还探索了通过交叉播种来组合不同的覆盖度量，结果非常令人鼓舞:这种纯粹基于模糊化的方法可以在CGC数据集中崩溃至少与之前组合模糊化和concolic执行的方法(Driller)相同数量的二进制文件。同时，我们的方法使用更少的计算资源。
papers.title_zh: 敏感和协作:分析灰箱模糊化中覆盖度量的影响

papers.title: On Design Inference from Binaries Compiled using Modern C++ Defenses
papers.authors: Rukayat Ayomide Erinfolami, Anh Quach, Aravind Prakash
papers.abstract: Due to the use of code pointers, polymorphism in C++ has been targeted by attackers and defenders alike. Vulnerable programs that violate the runtime object type integrity have been successfully exploited. Particularly, virtual dispatch mechanism and type confusion during casting have been targeted. As a consequence, multiple defenses have been proposed in recent years to defend against attacks that target polymorphism. Particularly, compiler-based defenses incorporate design information—specifically class-hierarchy-related information—into the binary, and enforce runtime security policies to assert type integrity. In this paper, we perform a systematic evaluation of the side-effects and unintended consequences of compiler-based security. Specifically, we show that application of modern defenses makes reverse engineering and semantic recovery easy. In particular, we show that modern defenses “leak" class hierarchy information, i.e., design information, thereby deter adoption in closed-source software. We consider a comprehensive set of 10 modern C++ defenses and show that 9 out of the 10 at least partially reveal design information as an unintended consequence of the defense. We argue a necessity for design-leakage-sensitive defenses that are preferable for closed-source use.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于代码指针的使用，C++中的多态性已经成为攻击者和防御者的目标。违反运行时对象类型完整性的易受攻击的程序已被成功利用。特别是针对虚拟调度机制和类型混淆问题。因此，近年来提出了多种防御措施来抵御针对多态性的攻击。特别是，基于编译器的防御将设计信息(特别是与类层次结构相关的信息)合并到二进制文件中，并强制执行运行时安全策略来维护类型完整性。在本文中，我们对基于编译器的安全性的副作用和意外后果进行了系统的评估。具体来说，我们表明现代防御的应用使逆向工程和语义恢复变得容易。特别是，我们表明现代防御“泄漏”类层次信息，即设计信息，从而阻止了闭源软件的采用。我们考虑了一组全面的10个现代C++防御，并表明10个中的9个至少部分地泄露了设计信息，作为防御的一个非故意的结果。我们认为有必要设计泄漏敏感防御，这是封闭源代码使用的首选。
papers.title_zh: 使用现代C++防御编译的二进制程序的设计推理

papers.title: DECAF++: Elastic Whole-System Dynamic Taint Analysis
papers.authors: Ali Davanian, Zhenxiao Qi, Yu Qu, Heng Yin
papers.abstract: Whole-system dynamic taint analysis has many unique applications such as malware analysis and fuzz testing. Compared to process-level taint analysis, it offers a wider analysis scope, a better transparency and tamper resistance. The main barrier of applying whole-system dynamic taint analysis in practice is the large slowdown that can be sometimes up to 30 times. Ex-isting optimization schemes have either considerable baseline overheads (when there is no tainted data) or speciﬁc hardware dependencies. In this paper, we propose an elastic whole-system dynamic taint analysis approach, and implement it in a prototype called DECAF++. Elastic whole-system dynamic taint analysis strives to perform taint analysis as least frequent as possible while maintaining the precision and accuracy. Although similar ideas are explored before for process-level taint analysis, we are the ﬁrst to successfully achieve true elasticity for whole-system taint analysis via pure software approaches. We evaluated our prototype DECAF++ on nbench, apache bench, and SPEC CPU2006. Under taint analysis loads, DECAF++ achieves 202% speedup on nbench and 66% speedup on apache bench. Under no taint analysis load, DECAF++ imposes only 4% overhead on SPEC CPU2006.
papers.abstract_zh: 全系统动态污点分析有许多独特的应用，如恶意软件分析和模糊测试。与流程级污点分析相比，它提供了更广的分析范围、更好的透明性和抗篡改性。在实践中应用全系统动态污点分析的主要障碍是速度的大幅下降，有时可能高达30倍。现有的优化方案要么具有相当大的基线开销(当没有污染数据时)，要么具有特定的硬件依赖性。本文提出了一种弹性的全系统动态污点分析方法，并在DECAF++原型系统中实现了该方法。弹性全系统动态污点分析力求在保持精确性和准确性的同时尽可能少地执行污点分析。虽然类似的想法以前也探索过流程级污点分析，但我们是第一个通过纯软件方法成功实现全系统污点分析真正弹性的。我们在nbench、apache bench和SPEC CPU2006上评估了我们的原型DECAF++。在污点分析负载下，DECAF++在nbench上实现了202%的加速比，在apache bench上实现了66%的加速比。在没有污染的分析负载下，DECAF++在SPEC CPU2006上只增加了4%的开销。
papers.title_zh: DECAF++弹性全系统动态污点分析

papers.title: Towards a First Step to Understand the Cryptocurrency Stealing Attack on Ethereum
papers.authors: Zhen Cheng, Xinrui Hou, Runhuai Li, Yajin Zhou, Xiapu Luo, Jinku Li, Kui Ren
papers.abstract: We performed the first systematic study of a new attack on Ethereum that steals cryptocurrencies. The attack is due to the unprotected JSON-RPC endpoints existed in Ethereum nodes that could be exploited by attackers to transfer the Ether and ERC20 tokens to attackers-controlled accounts. This study aims to shed light on the attack, including malicious behaviors and profits of attackers. Specifically, we first designed and implemented a honeypot that could capture real attacks in the wild. We then deployed the honeypot and reported results of the collected data in a period of six months. In total, our system captured more than 308 million requests from 1,072 distinct IP addresses. We further grouped attackers into 36 groups with 59 distinct Ethereum accounts. Among them, attackers of 34 groups were stealing the Ether, while other 2 groups were targeting ERC20 tokens. The further behavior analysis showed that attackers were following a three-steps pattern to steal the Ether. Moreover, we observed an interesting type of transaction called zero gas transaction, which has been leveraged by attackers to steal ERC20 tokens. At last, we estimated the overall profits of attackers. To engage the whole community, the dataset of captured attacks is released on this https URL.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们对窃取加密货币的以太坊新攻击进行了首次系统研究。该攻击是由于以太坊节点中存在未受保护的JSON-RPC端点，攻击者可以利用这些端点将以太和ERC20令牌传输到攻击者控制的帐户。这项研究旨在揭示攻击，包括攻击者的恶意行为和利润。具体来说，我们首先设计并实现了一个可以在野外捕捉真实攻击的蜜罐。然后，我们部署了蜜罐，并在六个月内报告了收集数据的结果。总的来说，我们的系统从1，072个不同的IP地址捕获了超过3.08亿个请求。我们进一步将攻击者分成36组，每组有59个不同的以太坊账户。其中，34组攻击者正在窃取乙醚，而另外2组则针对ERC20令牌。进一步的行为分析表明，攻击者遵循三步模式来窃取以太网。此外，我们观察到一种有趣的交易类型，称为零汽油交易，攻击者利用它来窃取ERC20令牌。最后，我们估计了攻击者的总收益。为了让整个社区参与进来，捕获的攻击数据集将在这个https URL上发布。
papers.title_zh: 理解以太坊加密货币窃取攻击的第一步

papers.title: Fingerprinting Tooling used for SSH Compromisation Attempts
papers.authors: Vincent Ghiëtte, Harm Griffioen, Christian Doerr
papers.abstract: In SSH brute forcing attacks, adversaries try a lot of different username and password combinations in order to compromise a system. As such activities are easily recognizable in log files, sophisticated adversaries distribute brute forcing attacks over a large number of origins. Effectively finding such distributed campaigns proves however to be a difficult problem. In practice, when adversaries would spread out bruteforcing over multiple sources, they would likely reuse the same kind of software across all of these origins to simplify their operation and reduce cost. This means if we are able to identify the tooling used in these attempts, we could cluster similar tool usage into likely collaborating hosts and thus campaigns. In this paper, we demonstrate that it is possible to utilize cipher suites and SSH version strings to generate a unique fingerprint for a brute-forcing tool used by the attacker. Based on a study using a large honeynet with over 4,500 hosts, which received approximately 35 million compromisation attempts over the period of one month, we are able to identify 49 tools from the collected data, which correspond to off-the-shelf tools, as well as custom implementations. The method is also able to fingerprint individual versions of tools, and by revealing mismatches between advertised and actually implemented features detect hosts that spoof identifying information. Based on the generated fingerprints, we are able to correlate login credentials to distinguish distributed campaigns. We uncovered specific adversarial behaviors, tactics and procedures, frequently exhibiting clear timing patterns and tight coordination.
papers.abstract_zh: 在SSH强力攻击中，对手会尝试许多不同的用户名和密码组合来危害系统。由于此类活动在日志文件中很容易识别，老练的对手会在大量来源上散布暴力攻击。然而，有效地找到这样的分布式活动被证明是一个困难的问题。在实践中，当对手将暴力传播到多个来源时，他们可能会在所有这些来源中重用同一种软件，以简化他们的操作并降低成本。这意味着，如果我们能够识别这些尝试中使用的工具，我们就可以将类似的工具应用到可能的协作主机和活动中。在本文中，我们展示了利用密码套件和SSH版本字符串为攻击者使用的暴力破解工具生成唯一指纹的可能性。根据一项使用超过4，500台主机的大型蜜网的研究，该蜜网在一个月的时间内收到了大约3，500万次入侵尝试，我们能够从收集的数据中识别出49种工具，这些工具对应于现成的工具以及定制实施。该方法还能够对工具的各个版本进行指纹识别，并通过揭示广告和实际实现的功能之间的不匹配来检测欺骗标识信息的主机。基于生成的指纹，我们能够关联登录凭据以区分分布式活动。我们发现了特定的敌对行为、策略和程序，经常表现出清晰的时间模式和紧密的协调。
papers.title_zh: 用于SSH妥协尝试的指纹工具

papers.title: Timing Patterns and Correlations in Spontaneous SCADA Traffic for Anomaly Detection
papers.authors: Chih-Yuan Lin, Simin Nadjm-Tehrani
papers.abstract: SCADA traffic is known to have stable traffic patterns with request-response communications triggered by a polling mechanism and believed to be suitable for anomaly detection. In such a communication mode, a SCADA master sends requests to the field devices and receives a response accordingly. However, modern SCADA protocols such as IEC-60780-5-104 also allow non-requested communications. In the non-requested communication mode, the field devices can initiate messages spontaneously. Due to the lack of periodicity and cyclic sequences caused by a polling mechanism, many anomaly detection methodologies designed for request-response communications cannot be applied to traffic generated by modern SCADA protocols. New approaches to model spontaneous traffic need to be explored.
papers.abstract_zh: 众所周知，SCADA流量具有稳定的流量模式，通过轮询机制触发请求-响应通信，并且被认为适合于异常检测。在这种通信模式中，SCADA主机向现场设备发送请求，并相应地接收响应。然而，现代SCADA协议，如IEC-60780-5-104，也允许非请求通信。在非请求通信模式下，现场设备可以自发发起消息。由于轮询机制导致的周期性和循环序列的缺乏，许多为请求-响应通信设计的异常检测方法不能应用于由现代SCADA协议产生的流量。需要探索模拟自发交通的新方法。
papers.title_zh: 用于异常检测的自发SCADA流量中的定时模式和相关性

papers.title: USBESAFE: An End-Point Solution to Protect Against USB-Based Attacks
papers.authors: Amin Kharraz, Brandon L. Daley, Graham Z. Baker, William Robertson, Engin Kirda
papers.abstract: Targeted attacks via transient devices are not new. However, the introduction of BadUSB attacks has shifted the attack paradigm tremendously. Such attacks embed malicious code in device firmware and exploit the lack of access control in the USB protocol. In this paper, we propose USBESAFE as a mediator of the USB communication mechanism. By leveraging the insights from millions of USB packets, we propose techniques to generate a protection model that can identify covert USB attacks by distinguishing BadUSB devices as a set of novel observations. Our results show that USBESAFE works well in practice by achieving a true positive [TP] rate of 95.7% with 0.21% false positives [FP] with latency as low as three malicious USB packets on USB traffic. We tested USBESAFE by deploying the model at several end-points for 20 days and running multiple types of BadUSB-style attacks with different levels of sophistication. Our analysis shows that USBESAFE can detect a large number of mimicry attacks without introducing any significant changes to the standard USB protocol or the underlying systems. The performance evaluation also shows that USBESAFE is transparent to the operating system, and imposes no discernible performance overhead during the enumeration phase or USB communication compared to the unmodified Linux USB subsystem.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过瞬态设备进行有针对性的攻击并不新鲜。然而，BadUSB攻击的引入极大地改变了攻击模式。这种攻击在设备固件中嵌入恶意代码，并利用USB协议中缺乏访问控制。在本文中，我们提出USBESAFE作为USB通信机制的中介。通过利用来自数百万USB数据包的洞察力，我们提出了生成保护模型的技术，该模型可以通过将BadUSB设备区分为一组新的观察结果来识别隐蔽的USB攻击。我们的结果表明，USBESAFE在实践中运行良好，实现了95.7%的真阳性[TP]率，0.21%的假阳性[FP]，延迟低至USB流量上的三个恶意USB数据包。我们通过在几个端点部署该模型20天，并运行不同复杂程度的多种BadUSB类型的攻击来测试USBESAFE。我们的分析表明，USBESAFE可以检测到大量的模仿攻击，而无需对标准USB协议或底层系统进行任何重大更改。性能评估还表明，与未修改的Linux USB子系统相比，USBESAFE对操作系统是透明的，并且在枚举阶段或USB通信期间没有施加可察觉的性能开销。
papers.title_zh: USBESAFE:防止基于USB的攻击的端点解决方案

papers.title: Minimal Kernel: An Operating System Architecture for TEE to Resist Board Level Physical Attacks
papers.authors: Shijun Zhao, Qianying Zhang, Yu Qin, Wei Feng, Dengguo Feng
papers.abstract: ARM specifications recommend that software residing in TEE’s (Trusted Execution Environment) secure world should be located in the on-chip memory to prevent board level physical attacks. However, the on-chip memory is very limited, placing significant limits on TEE’s functionality. The minimal kernel operating system architecture addresses this problem by building a small kernel which executes the whole TEE system only on the on-chip memory on demand and cryptographically protects all the data/code stored outside of SoC. In the architecture, a small kernel is built inside the TEE OS kernel space and achieves the minimal size by only including the very essential components used to execute and protect the TEE system. The minimal kernel consists of a minimal demand-paging system, which sets the on-chip memory as the only working memory for the TEE system and the off-chip memory as a backing store, and a memory protection component, which provides confidentiality and integrity protection on the backing store. A Merkle tree based memory protection scheme, reducing the requirement for on-chip memory, allows the minimal kernel to protect large trusted applications (TAs). This OS organization makes it possible to achieve the goal of physical security without losing any TEE’s functionality. We have incorporated a prototype of minimal kernel into OPTEE, a popular open source TEE OS. Our implementation only requires a runtime footprint of 100 KB on-chip memory but can protect the entire OP-TEE kernel and TAs, which are dozens of megabytes.
papers.abstract_zh: ARM规范建议，位于TEE(可信执行环境)安全环境中的软件应位于片内存储器中，以防止板级物理攻击。然而，片上存储器非常有限，极大地限制了TEE的功能。最小内核操作系统架构通过构建一个小内核来解决这个问题，该小内核仅在片上存储器上按需执行整个TEE系统，并对存储在SoC外部的所有数据/代码进行加密保护。在该架构中，一个小内核构建在TEE OS内核空间内，通过仅包含用于执行和保护TEE系统的非常重要的组件来实现最小的大小。最小内核由最小请求分页系统和内存保护组件组成，最小请求分页系统将片上内存设置为TEE系统的唯一工作内存，将片外内存设置为后备存储，内存保护组件为后备存储提供机密性和完整性保护。基于Merkle树的存储器保护方案降低了对片上存储器的需求，允许最小的内核保护大型可信应用(ta)。这种操作系统组织使得在不损失任何TEE功能的情况下实现物理安全的目标成为可能。我们已经将一个最小内核的原型整合到OPTEE中，这是一个流行的开源TEE操作系统。我们的实现只需要运行时占用100 KB的片上内存，但可以保护整个OP-TEE内核和TAs，它们有几十兆字节。
papers.title_zh: 最小内核:TEE抵抗板级物理攻击的操作系统架构

papers.title: ScaRR: Scalable Runtime Remote Attestation for Complex Systems
papers.authors: Flavio Toffalini, Eleonora Losiouk, Andrea Biondo, Jianying Zhou, Mauro Conti
papers.abstract:
The introduction of remote attestation (RA) schemes has allowed academia and industry to enhance the security of their systems. The commercial products currently available enable only the validation of static properties, such as applications fingerprint, and do not handle runtime properties, such as control-flow correctness. This limitation pushed researchers towards the identification of new approaches, called runtime RA. However, those mainly work on embedded devices, which share very few common features with complex systems, such as virtual machines in a cloud. A naive deployment of runtime RA schemes for embedded devices on complex systems faces scalability problems, such as the representation of complex control-flows or slow verification phase. 
In this work, we present ScaRR: the first Scalable Runtime Remote attestation schema for complex systems. Thanks to its novel control-flow model, ScaRR enables the deployment of runtime RA on any application regardless of its complexity, by also achieving good performance. We implemented ScaRR and tested it on the benchmark suite SPEC CPU 2017. We show that ScaRR can validate on average 2M control-flow events per second, definitely outperforming existing solutions.
papers.abstract_zh:
远程证明(RA)方案的引入使得学术界和工业界能够增强其系统的安全性。目前可用的商业产品只能验证静态属性，如应用程序指纹，而不能处理运行时属性，如控制流正确性。这一限制促使研究人员寻找新的方法，称为运行时RA。然而，这些主要工作在嵌入式设备上，这些设备与复杂系统(如云中的虚拟机)共享很少的共同功能。复杂系统上嵌入式设备的运行时RA方案的简单部署面临可扩展性问题，例如复杂控制流的表示或缓慢的验证阶段。
在这项工作中，我们提出ScaRR:第一个复杂系统的可伸缩运行时远程证明模式。由于其新颖的控制流模型，ScaRR支持在任何应用程序上部署运行时RA，而不管其复杂性如何，同时还能实现良好的性能。我们实现了ScaRR，并在基准套件SPEC CPU 2017上进行了测试。我们证明ScaRR平均每秒可以验证2M控制流事件，绝对优于现有的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: ScaRR:复杂系统的可扩展运行时远程证明

papers.title: Toward the Analysis of Embedded Firmware through Automated Re-hosting
papers.authors: Eric Gustafson, Marius Muench, Chad Spensky, Nilo Redini, Aravind Machiry, Yanick Fratantonio, Davide Balzarotti, Aurélien Francillon, Yung Ryn Choe, Christopher Kruegel, Giovanni Vigna
papers.abstract: Author(s): Gustafson, Eric; Muench, Marius; Spensky, Chad; Redini, Nilo; Machiry, Aravind; Fratantonio, Yanick; Balzarotti, Davide; Francillon, Aurelien; Choe, Yung Ryn; Kruegel, Christopher; Vigna, Giovanni
papers.abstract_zh: 作者:埃里克·古斯塔夫森；马吕斯·明希；斯宾斯基，乍得；雷迪尼、尼洛；马吉里，阿拉文德；弗拉安东尼奥、亚尼克；巴尔扎罗蒂，大卫；弗朗西隆，奥雷连诺；崔永林；克里斯托弗·克鲁格；乔瓦尼·维格纳
papers.title_zh: 通过自动重新托管分析嵌入式固件

papers.title: CryptoREX: Large-scale Analysis of Cryptographic Misuse in IoT Devices
papers.authors: Li Zhang, Jiongyi Chen, Wenrui Diao, Shanqing Guo, Jian Weng, Kehuan Zhang
papers.abstract: Cryptographic functions play a critical role in the secure transmission and storage of application data. Although most crypto functions are well-deﬁned and carefully-implemented in standard libraries, in practice, they could be easily misused or incorrectly encapsulated due to its error-prone nature and inexperience of developers. This situation is even worse in the IoT domain, given that developers tend to sacriﬁce security for performance in order to suit resource-constrained IoT devices. Given the severity and the pervasiveness of such bad practice, it is crucial to raise public awareness about this issue, ﬁnd the misuses and shed light on best practices. In this paper, we design and implement C RYPTO REX, a framework to identify crypto misuse of IoT devices under diverse architectures and in a scalable manner. In particular, C RYPTO REX lifts binary code to a uniﬁed IR and performs static taint analysis across multiple executables. To aggres-sively capture and identify misuses of self-deﬁned crypto APIs, C RYPTO REX dynamically updates the API list during taint analysis and automatically tracks the function arguments. Running on 521 ﬁrmware images with 165 pre-deﬁned crypto APIs, it successfully discovered 679 crypto misuse issues in total, which on average costs only 1120 seconds per ﬁrmware. Our study shows 24.2% of ﬁrmware images violate at least one misuse rule, and most of the discovered misuses are unknown before. The misuses could result in sensitive data leakage, authentication bypass, password brute-force, etc. Our ﬁndings highlight the poor implementation and weak protection in today’s IoT development.
papers.abstract_zh: 加密功能在应用数据的安全传输和存储中起着至关重要的作用。尽管大多数加密函数在标准库中都有明确的定义和谨慎的实现，但在实践中，由于其容易出错的特性和开发人员缺乏经验，它们很容易被误用或错误地封装。这种情况在物联网领域甚至更糟，因为开发人员倾向于牺牲安全性来换取性能，以适应资源受限的物联网设备。鉴于这种不良做法的严重性和普遍性，提高公众对这一问题的认识、发现滥用和阐明最佳做法至关重要。在本文中，我们设计并实现了C RYPTO REX，这是一个在不同架构下以可扩展的方式识别物联网设备加密滥用的框架。特别是，C RYPTO REX将二进制代码提升到统一的IR，并对多个可执行文件执行静态污点分析。为了全面捕获和识别自定义加密API的误用，C RYPTO REX在污点分析期间动态更新API列表，并自动跟踪函数参数。在521个带有165个预定义加密API的固件映像上运行时，它总共成功发现了679个加密误用问题，平均每个固件仅花费1120秒。我们的研究显示，24.2%的固件图像违反了至少一条误用规则，并且大多数发现的误用是以前未知的。误用可能导致敏感数据泄漏、绕过身份验证、密码暴力破解等。我们的发现凸显了当今物联网发展中实施不力和保护不力的问题。
papers.title_zh: CryptoREX:物联网设备中加密误用的大规模分析

papers.title: PAtt: Physics-based Attestation of Control Systems
papers.authors: Hamid Reza Ghaeini, Matthew Chan, Raad Bahmani, Ferdinand Brasser, Luis Garcia, Jianying Zhou, Ahmad-Reza Sadeghi, Nils Ole Tippenhauer, Saman A. Zonouz
papers.abstract: Ensuring the integrity of embedded programmable logic controllers (PLCs) is critical for safe operation of industrial con-trol systems. In particular, a cyber-attack could manipulatecontrol logic running on the PLCs to bring the process ofsafety-critical application into unsafe states. Unfortunately,PLCs are typically not equipped with hardware support thatallows the use of techniques such as remote attestation to ver-ify the integrity of the logic code. In addition, so far remoteattestation is not able to verify the integrity of the physicalprocess controlled by the PLC.In this work, we present PAtt, a system that combines re-mote software attestation with control process validation. PAttleverages operation permutations—subtle changes in the op-eration sequences based on integrity measurements—whichdo not affect the physical process but yield unique traces ofsensor readings during execution. By encoding integrity mea-surements of the PLC’s memory state (software and data) intoits control operation, our system allows to remotely verifythe integrity of the control logic based on the resulting sensortraces. We implement the proposed system on a real PLCcontrolling a robot arm, and demonstrate its feasibility. Ourimplementation enables the detection of attackers that ma-nipulate the PLC logic to change process state and/or reportspoofed sensor readings (with an accuracy of 97% againsttested attacks).
papers.abstract_zh: 确保嵌入式可编程逻辑控制器(PLC)的完整性对于工业控制系统的安全运行至关重要。特别是，网络攻击可以操纵运行在PLC上的控制逻辑，使安全关键应用程序的过程进入不安全状态。不幸的是，PLC通常没有配备硬件支持，允许使用远程证明等技术来验证逻辑代码的完整性。此外，到目前为止，远程证明还不能验证由PLC控制的物理过程的完整性。在本文中，我们提出了PAtt，一个将远程软件证明与控制过程验证相结合的系统。模式利用操作排列，即基于完整性测量的操作序列的细微变化，这不会影响物理过程，但会在执行过程中产生传感器读数的独特痕迹。通过将PLC存储状态(软件和数据)的完整性测量值编码到其控制操作中，我们的系统允许根据产生的传感器轨迹远程验证控制逻辑的完整性。我们在一个控制机械臂的真实PLC上实现了这个系统，并证明了它的可行性。我们的实施能够检测到攻击者操纵PLC逻辑来改变过程状态和/或报告伪造的传感器读数(对测试攻击的准确率为97%)。
papers.title_zh: PAtt:基于物理的控制系统证明

papers.title: COMA: Communication and Obfuscation Management Architecture
papers.authors: Kimia Zamiri Azar, Farnoud Farahmand, Hadi Mardani Kamali, Shervin Roshanisefat, Houman Homayoun, William Diehl, Kris Gaj, Avesta Sasan
papers.abstract: In this paper, we introduce a novel Communication and Obfuscation Management Architecture (COMA) to handle the storage of the obfuscation key and to secure the communication to/from untrusted yet obfuscated circuits. COMA addresses three challenges related to the obfuscated circuits: First, it removes the need for the storage of the obfuscation unlock key at the untrusted chip. Second, it implements a mechanism by which the key sent for unlocking an obfuscated circuit changes after each activation (even for the same device), transforming the key into a dynamically changing license. Third, it protects the communication to/from the COMA protected device and additionally introduces two novel mechanisms for the exchange of data to/from COMA protected architectures: (1) a highly secure but slow double encryption, which is used for exchange of key and sensitive data (2) a high-performance and low-energy yet leaky encryption, secured by means of frequent key renewal. We demonstrate that compared to state-of-the-art key management architectures, COMA reduces the area overhead by 14%, while allowing additional features including unique chip authentication, enabling activation as a service (for IoT devices), reducing the side channel threats on key management architecture, and providing two new means of secure communication to/from an untrusted chip.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们介绍了一种新的通信和混淆管理架构(COMA ),以处理混淆密钥的存储，并保护与不可信但混淆的电路之间的通信。COMA解决了与混淆电路相关的三个挑战:首先，它消除了在不可信芯片上存储混淆解锁密钥的需要。第二，它实现了一种机制，通过这种机制，在每次激活后(即使对于同一设备),为解锁模糊电路而发送的密钥会发生变化，从而将密钥转换成动态变化的许可证。第三，它保护去往/来自受COMA保护的设备的通信，并且另外引入了用于去往/来自受COMA保护的架构的数据交换的两种新颖机制:(1)高度安全但缓慢的双重加密，其用于密钥和敏感数据的交换；(2)高性能和低能量但泄漏的加密，通过频繁的密钥更新来保护。我们证明，与最先进的密钥管理架构相比，COMA减少了14%的面积开销，同时允许额外的功能，包括唯一的芯片认证，实现激活即服务(针对物联网设备)，减少密钥管理架构上的边信道威胁，以及提供两种新的与不受信任的芯片进行安全通信的方法。
papers.title_zh: COMA:通信和混淆管理架构

papers.title: PRO-ORAM: Practical Read-Only Oblivious RAM
papers.authors: Shruti Tople, Yaoqi Jia, Prateek Saxena
papers.abstract: Oblivious RAM is a well-known cryptographic primitive to hide data access patterns. However, the best known ORAM schemes require a logarithmic computation time in the general case which makes it infeasible for use in real-world applications. In practice, hiding data access patterns should incur a constant latency per access. In this work, we present PRO-ORAM— an ORAM construction that achieves constant latencies per access in a large class of applications. PRO-ORAM theoretically and empirically guarantees this for read-only data access patterns, wherein data is written once followed by read requests. It makes hiding data access pattern practical for read-only workloads, incurring sub-second computational latencies per access for data blocks of 256 KB, over large (gigabyte-sized) datasets. PRO-ORAM supports throughputs of tens to hundreds of MBps for fetching blocks, which exceeds network bandwidth available to average users today. Our experiments suggest that dominant factor in latency offered by PRO-ORAM is the inherent network throughput of transferring final blocks, rather than the computational latencies of the protocol. At its heart, PRO-ORAM utilizes key observations enabling an aggressively parallelized algorithm of an ORAM construction and a permutation operation, as well as the use of trusted computing technique (SGX) that not only provides safety but also offers the advantage of lowering communication costs.
papers.abstract_zh: 不经意RAM是一种众所周知的隐藏数据访问模式的加密原语。然而，众所周知的ORAM方案在一般情况下需要对数计算时间，这使得它在实际应用中不可行。实际上，隐藏数据访问模式会导致每次访问都有恒定的延迟。在这项工作中，我们提出了PRO-ORAM——一种ORAM结构，它在一大类应用程序中实现了每次访问的恒定延迟。对于只读数据访问模式，支持ORAM的理论和经验保证了这一点，在只读数据访问模式中，数据被写入一次，随后是读取请求。它使隐藏数据访问模式对于只读工作负载变得可行，对于大型(千兆字节大小)数据集，每次访问256 KB的数据块会导致亚秒级的计算延迟。PRO-ORAM支持几十到几百MBps的取块吞吐量，这超过了当今普通用户可用的网络带宽。我们的实验表明，PRO-ORAM提供的延迟的主导因素是传输最终块的固有网络吞吐量，而不是协议的计算延迟。在其核心部分，PRO-ORAM利用关键观测数据实现ORAM构造和置换运算的积极并行算法，并使用可信计算技术(SGX ),不仅提供了安全性，还提供了降低通信成本的优势。
papers.title_zh: 亲ORAM:实用的只读不经意内存

papers.title: The DUSTER Attack: Tor Onion Service Attribution Based on Flow Watermarking with Track Hiding
papers.authors: Alfonso Iacovazzi, Daniel Frassinelli, Yuval Elovici
papers.abstract:
Tor is a distributed network composed of volunteer relays 
which are designed to preserve the sender-receiver anonymity 
of communications on the Internet. Despite the use of the 
onion routing paradigm, Tor is vulnerable to traffic analysis 
attacks. In this paper, we present DUSTER, an active traffic 
analysis attack based on flow watermarking that exploits a 
vulnerability in Tor’s congestion control mechanism in order to link a Tor onion service with its real IP address. The 
proposed watermarking system embeds a watermark at the 
destination of a Tor circuit which is propagated throughout 
the Tor network and can be detected by our modified Tor 
relays in the proximity of the onion service. Furthermore, 
upon detection, the watermark is cancelled so that the target 
onion service remains unaware of its presence. We performed 
a set of experiments over the real Tor network in order to 
evaluate the feasibility of this attack. Our results show that 
true positive rates above 94% and false-positive rates below 
0.05% can be easily obtained. Finally, we discuss a solution to 
mitigate this and other traffic analysis attacks which exploit 
Tor’s congestion control.
papers.abstract_zh:
Tor是一个由志愿者中继组成的分布式网络
其被设计成保持发送者-接收者的匿名性
互联网上的交流。尽管使用了
洋葱路由范例，Tor易受流量分析的攻击
攻击。在本文中，我们介绍了一种主动流量——簇
基于流水印的攻击分析
Tor拥塞控制机制中的漏洞，以便将Tor洋葱服务与其真实IP地址链接起来。这
所提出的水印系统在图像中嵌入水印
Tor电路传播的目的地
Tor网络，并且可以被我们修改的Tor检测到
洋葱服务附近的中继站。此外，
在检测时，水印被取消
洋葱服务仍然不知道它的存在。我们表演了
在真实Tor网络上进行一系列实验，以便
评估这次攻击的可行性。我们的结果表明
真阳性率高于94%，假阳性率低于
0.05%可以轻松获得。最后，我们讨论一个解决方案
减轻这种攻击和其他利用
Tor的拥塞控制。
papers.title_zh: 基于轨迹隐藏流水印的集群攻击:Tor Onion服务归属

papers.title: TALON: An Automated Framework for Cross-Device Tracking Detection
papers.authors: Konstantinos Solomos, Panagiotis Ilia, Sotiris Ioannidis, Nicolas Kourtellis
papers.abstract: Although digital advertising fuels much of today's free Web, it typically does so at the cost of online users' privacy, due to the continuous tracking and leakage of users' personal data. In search for new ways to optimize the effectiveness of ads, advertisers have introduced new advanced paradigms such as cross-device tracking (CDT), to monitor users' browsing on multiple devices and screens, and deliver (re)targeted ads in the most appropriate screen.Unfortunately, this practice leads to greater privacy concerns for the end-user. Going beyond the state-of-the-art, we propose a novel methodology for detecting CDT and measuring the factors affecting its performance, in a repeatable and systematic way. This new methodology is based on emulating realistic browsing activity of end-users, from different devices, and thus triggering and detecting cross-device targeted ads. We design and build Talon a CDT measurement framework that implements our methodology and allows experimentation with multiple parallel devices, experimental setups and settings. By employing Talon, we perform several critical experiments, and we are able to not only detect and measure CDT with average AUC score of 0.78-0.96, but also to provide significant insights about the behavior of CDT entities and the impact on users' privacy. In the hands of privacy researchers, policy makers and end-users, Talon can be an invaluable tool for raising awareness and increasing transparency on tracking practices used by the ad-ecosystem.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管数字广告推动了今天的免费网络，但由于用户个人数据的持续跟踪和泄露，它通常以在线用户的隐私为代价。为了寻找优化广告效果的新方法，广告商引入了新的先进模式，如跨设备跟踪(CDT ),以监控用户在多个设备和屏幕上的浏览，并在最合适的屏幕上投放(重新投放)有针对性的广告。不幸的是，这种做法给最终用户带来了更大的隐私问题。超越最先进的技术，我们提出了一种新的方法，以可重复和系统的方式检测CDT并测量影响其性能的因素。这种新的方法基于模拟来自不同设备的终端用户的真实浏览活动，从而触发和检测跨设备定向广告。我们设计并构建了Talon CDT测量框架，实现了我们的方法，并允许使用多个并行设备、实验装置和设置进行实验。通过使用Talon，我们执行了几项关键实验，我们不仅能够检测和测量平均AUC分数为0.78-0.96的CDT，还能够提供关于CDT实体的行为以及对用户隐私的影响的重要见解。在隐私研究人员、政策制定者和最终用户的手中，Talon可以成为提高意识和增加广告生态系统跟踪实践透明度的宝贵工具。
papers.title_zh: TALON:跨设备跟踪检测的自动化框架

papers.title: Analysis of Location Data Leakage in the Internet Traffic of Android-based Mobile Devices
papers.authors: Nir Sivan, Ron Bitton, Asaf Shabtai
